title: Great Location to visit Barcelona
review: We stayed here as part of a Gate One tour.  It is located in a nice area close to everything (La Sagrada Familia, old town, Cathedral of the Sea, etc.)  The breakfast buffet was very good and I loved the Tumeric Latte they had and very good house made yogurt.  After the tour, we booked another night as we were going on to Bilbao and the Basque country after the tour concluded.  We had a couple of hiccups on this front.  First, we got locked out of our room the day the tour ended even though we had the next night booked and paid for.  Second, our room booking for the extra night came with late check out (15:00) and a bottle of Cava and chocolates.  They delivered the Cava and chocolates at 23:30 hours, when we were asleep. Then, we got locked out again the next day before checking out even though we had paid 30 euro for a 15:00 check out.  I was  disappointed that it didn't work out better and that we had to stress about the check out.  However, the staff were pleasant and friendly and I walked all over using the hotel as a base.  We did laundry, visited Antoni Guadi sites on a walking tour, and La Sagrada Familia all very easily with Google maps. I can't say I'd recommend this hotel again, as I don't know what else is out there, but it was clean and convenient.…

review: Thank you for sharing this information.  Allow me to expose that we are allowed to pre-authorize the credit cards of all those bookings we consider to. If a reservation is cancelled on time, means correctly, we have no reason to charge anything. If this reservation had a preauthorization made, this expires on 30 days from that date and the funds are free again. This option applies on active reservations, and if it still active until the check-in day, we confirm the preauthorization, if not, we refund.  Anyway, if we recieve any requests, we will be happy to make some checks and to proceed with the anticipated refund of that preauthorization.   We feel deeply sorry if you had no answer from us, we will check all this information. Even if we are as much as digitalized as we can, in order to be more efficient, there's always a human team behind that may make mistakes. We are 24 hs. commited to our guests and always ready to solve any issue, having the proper notice of it.  Hope we can arrive to solve whatever it may happened, as fast as we could. We picked this hotel because it was well positioned for both the Sagrada Familia, and the ramblas. about 15 minutes walk to both. If you can't walk very far, then two metro stations close by will help you. The hotel is 4 star, and worth everyone of them. The room was lovely and clean with a FREE safe, and all the normal bathroom things you get. The WIFI was also free, and very good. The breakfast was great, loads of choice. they will even cook things for you not available on the counters, (such as omelletes fried eggs ETC). The best thing about the hotel is the staff, they are fantastic, very helpful, giving you free maps to explore, nothing was to hard for them.  Look if you plan a stay in Barcelona you can't…

title: Loved it

As we had a very early flight and were only in Barcelona a few days we just decided to take the room available so we could get out and see what The city had to offer. It was spotless and a decent size. Plenty of soft towels and toiletries. Shower was amazing. No English channels but who goes on a trip just to stay in the room and watch TV.  I'd definitely return to Barcelona and would have no hesitation in staying here again.

review: This hotel is a short walk from the closest metro. I was with my son and felt safe the whole time. The hotel is great. Clean tidy and modern. It has a nice small gym should you need it. The room was clean and spacious with a good bathroom with separate shower. The room could do with a tea coffee machine but that would be my only complaint. The hotel could do with a pool to take it to the next level. We stayed bed and breakfast. The breakfast was great. Everything you could ask for and as a bonus there was a bottle of carva. This was a great stay which we used as a base to watch the football. All the staff were friendly and helped all they could. Jonathon was excellent with any requests. Loved it. If I go back to Barcelona I will look to stay there again.

title: Good location...helpful staff..
review: Clean tidy and close to where we wanted to visit.  Good walking distances.  Staff excellent. Amenities clean and modern.  Easy to find premuses. Part of franchise to we could enquire from previous Ayre Hotel in Cordoba.

title: Excellent yet could be more fresh
review: Nice quiet hotel in a great location and close to and walkable to several attractions or for exploring by Metro or bus. Staff very friendly and helpful. One of the better buffet breakfasts we have had on our travels.

title: Great hotel to stay with.. :)
review: Staff was absolutely the best, however the interior in pictures looked more fresh than in real life. Location - amazing (nothing to compare to, but we could get around quickly and easily). Cannot give 5 points only due to some interior details and very narrow entrance door to the hotel itself.

title: Bad information
review: The hotel itself is about 3.5 if you don’t consider how centrally located they are. They do have good air condition, and overall the hotel is fairly clean and comfortable. The real problems came into play regarding service. There was a taxi strike, and we asked the front desk about alternate forms of transportation. We were told by the front desk to use Cabify, which is like Uber in the states. We downloaded and went through the process of reserving a ride, but they were also on strike. We settled on getting up earlier and using the metro, which was our only option. We set a up a wake up call, but they never called that morning. I set a backup alarm though. We were told by the man at the front desk last night to use the metro to get to the Barcelona Sants station. My husband…

title: Great location!  Fine hotel!
review: Dear Kevin,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for sharing your experience. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  We feel so sorry if we were not able to provide the correct information, nor even explain better the best alternative to go to the airport. Arc de Triomf station dispose both Metro and Train (cercanias) to take. Depending on the destination is the way to pick, and in your case its mandatory to take the Train. We are so aware of your concern and we will revise our procedures in this area, as well of taking the proper note of wake up calls, that even is an extra service and is not binding, we understand the importance of it and we will act in consequence.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com

title: Just Top
review: This very nice hotel is within walking distance of the Sagrada Familia, la Rambla, two Gaudi houses, status shopping and dining and grocery stores.  We were delighted that the small restaurant was an option for dinner after a long day, and the breakfast buffet was good.  The room was comfortably decorated and pristine.  Staff was very helpful.  All in all a good choice!

title: Great location for a weekend away
review: We Stayd  here two nights , really friendly Staff, nice quite clean rooms, huge space , large bathroom.. walking distance to Sagrada.. also a parking Place with really good price...a 5 star experience,,

title: Nice hotel
review: Nice hotel, close to the Arco de Triumph, close to the center. I was glad to be in this neighbourhood. It's not noisy there. The hotel has 4 stars, rooms are comfortable, the bed is very big. In any case I recommend.

title: Barcelona/Portugal
review: Dear Agnieszka,   Thank you so much for such lovely words! We're glad to have had you as our guest, and we wish we could have the chance to see you soon!  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Little gem in the centre of Barcelona
review: This hotel was very clean and central to the activities.  We we went to Montserrat, which you take a cable car up to the mountains to see where the Monks live.  We went to Zaragoza, Madrid, Segovia, Avila, Salamanca, Santoago de Compostela.  Then off to Portugal.  We stayed in Porto, Fatima, Nazare, Obidos and Lisbon.  A beautiful trip and I am really glad I went to these two beautiful countries.

title: Good location and price but wouldn't stay again
review: Dear Gene,   Thank you so much for offering us a minute to share your experience, not only with us, but also for all your exciting trip!  Hope to see you soon!  E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Joining a cruise.
review: The hotel itself doesn't look like much from the outside, but it's location, quietness and comfortable rooms are amazing. Hotel staff is very attentive and helpful. Our room was on the 7th floor overlooking neighbouring buildings and the hills of the outskirts of Barcelona. The bed was gigantic and very comfortable. Free bottled water was very helpful.

title: The breakfast, the best
review: The hotel rooms are large, comfortable and quiet. The breakfast is amazing although a little expensive and the staff are very friendly and helpful. The area in which the hotel is located is not very nice, but it is only a few minutes walk from the main tourist attractions of the city.

title: Convinient and well appointed
review: Dear Alejandro,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Love it!
review: It is a nice hotel with well appointed rooms, friendly staff and good quality varied breakfast. Well located for attractions. Only drawback was its staff had difficulty organising invoices even though there was  several emails requesting specifics prior to arrival in t he booking/confirmation stage and in the morning we were checking out and even though new emails were sent /resent and a promise that it would be sorted in t he evening, it was not. Staff member on duty that evening however managed to sort the problem (though he did struggle he was friendly and polite all along!)

title: Nice Hotel
review: Dear bibimou,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day. title: Enjoyable stay
review: We had a lovely room.  A plus was that we were walking distance to major attractions.  Staff was very courteous and the breakfast was excellent.  Enjoyed the public spaces of the hotel.  Would stay there again.

title: Great Stay!!
review: Sara on the front desk was amazing.  Our flight arrived in the morning and we were able to check into our room around 1030.  After flying all night this allowed us to sleep and then enjoy all that Barcelona had to offer.  We left the day of the protest and the guys on the desk were very helpful assisting us to leave the city as no cabs were running.  Would recommend this hotel and would stay here again.  Very quiet neighbourhood.  Many thanks.

title: Great 7 Night Stay
review: Thank you Karen!  We are so grateful reading this review, lovely!  Hope to see you soon!  E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great👍
review: Lovely clean hotel located a 20 minute walk away from the city centre and La Sagrada Familia. It's also worth mentioning that Ayre Hotel Capse is only a 10 minute walk away from the Arc de Triomf metro station. This makes getting from the airport to the hotel a breeze! (Get on at either terminal and change to L1 towards Fondo at Torrassa. From there it's only 10 stops until the Arc de Triomf station.)  We only booked a standard double room, nevertheless it was still very comfortable to stay in. Air-conditioning and WIFI worked well - what more can you ask for! The 4 free bottles of water that were in our fridge on arrival were also much appreciated.  The only one thing that initially caused us to worry was that we could hear noise through our door on the first night. This noise…

title: 5 day Business Training Session - Hotel Room, Meeting Room & Restaurant

title: Short Break in Barcelona
review: Excellent hotel regarding location, staff, and cleanliness the staff were very helpful they gave me a map to the city and explained to me the good places I should visit, also i liked the cafe in the hotel it has some tables on the road and you can enjoy the nice weather and your drink

title: Overall pleasant experience.
review: Did a two night stay.  Good hotel...upgraded to a premium room and parking garage for only 22 Euros per night. Premium gave larger bed; top floor (7) and check out time as late as 1500 (3:00pm).  Worth the money.  Can't comment on the food as I didn't use that service. The only reason I'm not rating with 4 stars is: The room wasn't very quiet...could hear other guests, and noises from the street. It wasn't enough to really bother me, but some may prefer more quiet.  Overall, good experience.

title: Great Room and Friendly Staff
review: Dear Steve,   Thank you so much for dedicate a while on evaluate us, sharing your experience on TripAdvisor!  Thank you, as well, for your visit and overall review.   Hope to guest you soon!  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Lovely Week in Barcelona
review: Great value for the room. Staff was friendly and very helpful at all times. Would highly recommend staying as it is downtown and very near Sagrada Familia, Also a two block walk from the subways for easy access to other points of interest.

title: Holiday
review: Dear Gregj156,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! title: SUPER!
review: I have been in Barcelona on several occasions, but can I say that this is the best hotel I have stayed in. Mainly due to the dedication of the staff who go the extra mile, who are so helpful and courteous. If I return to Barcelona I shall return to the Ayre Hotel Caspe Thanks again

title: Lovely hotel, not far from main sites.
review: We took long weekend to explore Barcelona and we were very impressed. Staff couldn’t do enough to help and the hotel was really lovely, tidy, modern and food was amazing! Would definitely recommend it!

title: The best of both worlds
review: Thank you Jean for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor!!!   Hope we can have the chance to guest you again!  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Very European!
review: The hotel is located not far away from the centre, the marina, the arc de triomph but quiet enough to get a good night's sleep. All the staff at the hotel are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are very clean.

title: Nice modern hotel
review: Dear Munyak,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Ayre Hotel
review: Room had a King size bed; very efficient use of space; shower + tub. Wash clothes only provided upon request.  Hotel staff was very professional, courteous & helpful & spoke English!  Breakfast was amazing!  It is in a great area; lots of Patisserie or Cafe or Tapas within a few blocks. However the trash bins are across the street and the aroma greets you every morning.  10 minute walk to La Rambla or Segrada Familia!

title: First Time in Barcelona
review: Nicely situated about a 20 minute walk from the city centre.   Hotel very comfortable and spacious.   Quiet.    Rooms very comfortable, good sized bed and nice bathroom with walk in shower area and separate bath.    Only down side was lack off tea/coffee making facility which did surprise me for a 4 star hotel.

title: Perfect base

title: Nothing special
review: We based ourselves here for our three day trip to Barcelona. 30min walk to all major attractions but area quiet n safe place to stay.  Rooms v clean v well equipped. Generous healthy or naughty breakfast buffet.  Friendly helpful staff.  5 Euro taxi to most places.

title: Very good hotel for families
review: Dear Phyl,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Amazing accommodation
review: 4 stars? Nope! Average at most. The worst was the smell from the drain that came every time we showered! When talking to the reception we got the excuse that it's a problem in all of Barcelona, however, when talking to our local friend who lives there that was not the case. Why would you lie to your guests? Location was ok. Min 20 min walk to anything. Would not recommend this to friends and family

title: Lovely staff, great and clean room
review: Fast chick-in and I like all the staff in the hotel especially the lady (Sara) in the reception. Room was wide and clean. Breakfast is great, location is good. When it's raining they provid you an umbrella

title: Barcelona break
review: Dear AbdulRahman,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! title: Just 20mins from Catalunya Pl
review: Hidden down a side street so took a little while to find, but very pleased we did.  Very friendly staff on reception desk who took the time to explain the best places to visit and provided us with a map. Room very clean and lovely, comfortable bed. Quiet location.  Only down side was no tea/coffee facilities in the room

title: Convenient, clean and generally a great place for a city break
review: Dear kmches11,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Good hotel for business trip
review: Ayre hotel is a good hotel, very clean, staff were lovely and friendly, we never ate in so can't comment. Like the title says 20 mins from Catalunya Pl, but if your exploring the city then this won't be a problem. The only negative I have towards the hotel is the beds, way to firm, I know this is a personal thing but I think they are definitely on the to hard side, my wife and I both were a bit sore in the mornings. Overall though, I would recommend Ayre Hotel.

title: It could be better
review: The hotel is very close to transportation going directly to catalunya and the neighborhood is full of supermarkets and restaurants. However the hotel is not the cleanest. A couple of hairs were found in the bathroom sink as soon as we arrived. Toiletries were fine, Tous, but soon were changed to a lower grade ones. The room was always smelly and the AC was horrible.  Breakfast was fine and the waitress was always cheerful and helpful. I wish I knew her name. She must be promoted for her fine service and care.  Wifi was nerve wrecking and never worked inside room. Only worked in the lobby and breakfast hall.

title: Not A Great Hotel
review: Dear Iman,   Thank you so much for choosing us.  Thank you, as well, for the precious information you are providing. This kind of comments helps us to improve our service.  We take the proper note on every single comment you left, in order to work on that as soon as possible.  Hope to see you again soon to have another chance to satisfy you!  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great hotel in a very quiet environment.
review: The location is not bad from tourist areas of interest.  But the bed/pillows were very hard and besides the bed sheet, there was only a sad brown fleece blanket. The AC in our room was also very weak. However, service was decent.

title: Decent place but the smell....
review: Thank you Lisa for giving us the chance to guest you during your stay in Barcelona!  I understand not everything was as you might expected, and we apologize for that. I hope in your next visit we can have the opportunity to satisfy you at 100%.  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great stay! Would highly recommend
review: The nearest Metro station and bus stop are within a walking distance. It is also located near the main landmark of Barcelona. The hotel is not in the middle of tourist places, so very quiet but not difficult to travel from the hotel to those attractions.

title: The hotel deserve no more than  3 stars
review: Bed too hard difficult to sleep, breakfast very simple and limited even they put soccers so u need to line many times to get what u want,internet cut off frequently to show u aservay note so u cannot use internet till u put rate them of course good rate, staff good , location excellent.

title: Nice Average Hotel
review: Thank you Suad for your cooperation, sharing your experience with Tripadvisor's community.   Unfortunately, not everything seems to be as you and us might wanted to be. Please excuse us if we were not able to fulfill your expectations.  Anyway, we appreciate so much your comments towards our staff and other points.  Hope to have another chance to satisfy you in the future.  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Another great stay at Ayre Caspe
review: This was my first stay at the Ayre Hotel. Hotel is very clean, staff super friendly and helpful with good English. Rooms are fine with comfortable bed and pillows. Wifi is excellent and available everywhere in the hotel. The  air conditioner in the room was very poor but shower was fantastic. Breakfast buffet it's very average there is room for improvement. Hotel location is great and overall is excellent value for money in my opinion. I would stay there again.

title: A very average hotel within walking distance of the old City, very clean
review: Thank you so much for choosing us for your visit to Barcelona! We feel so proud!  Thank you so much for wi-fi comments, we are constantly working on its improvement, and we love to see good feedback.  Don't hesitate in contacting us when you plan to return to visit us!  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Summer vacation in Barcelona
review: This was our 3rd stay here and again we had a great time. The staff is always friendly and helpful with good English. The entire hotel is spotless clean! We had both express breakfast service and buffet and they are both good deals. Food is delicious. If I had one wish is try to use real coffee at the bar, not Nespresso but I know this is just a taste issue... we will definitely stay here again, mainly because of the professional staff and clean hotel!

title: Good location but not great value for money
review: Location is within walking/wheeling distance to a lot of Barcelona's attractions.  I use a wheelchair and the room was properly adapted however only slept two so I had to pay for an extra room for my teenage daughter.  The lobby was accessible via a steep-ish marble ramp down from street level.  WiFi was poor, I did complain but there wasn't much they could do.    Bar closed at 11 which seemed early for Spain - my wife and I took a fancy for a cocktail at 10:45pm but were told it was too late.

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Thank you so much Rupert for giving us the chance to guest you in your Barcelona experience!  Thank you as well for your comments!  We recently increased the strenght of WiFi signal on several blackpoints we had, so i hope in your next visit you can enjoy it!  See you then!  E. García - Community Manager- Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great stay
review: The hotel was very clean and the staff were excellent. Its a shame the restaurant was not better, breakfast was very good but evening meal was not. Access to all the areas in Barcelona is good. Room was very good and the cleaners were first rate.

title: My stay
review: Thank you Don for your visit, review and comments!  We take note about your suggestion and i hope in your next visit we can surprise you!  See you then!  E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Travel lodge pretending to be 4 star!
review: Fantastic place in a great location! Staff were very friendly and always willing to help out. Breakfast was awesome!!! Great rooms and bathrooms. I would definitely stay there again ....have no hesitation in recommending this place to anyone travelling to Barcelona

title: Fab hotel
review: Great hotel within walking distance of the centre of Barcleona and really close to metro station. Staff were very friendly and helpful and the hotel was lovely and clean with good size rooms and free wifi would def recommend

title: Beautiful hotel, nice location
review: Thank you so much JenMac1410!  Lovely review, lovely words, lovely people!  See you soon i bet :)  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Perfect location and great service
review: This hotel is stunning and I loved the location. It's situated very close to the metro and many tourist attractions are a short walk from the hotel.  The rooms were clean and the customer service was a 10/10. All the employees were very helpful.

title: WIFI
review: Dear Thembi,   Thank you so much not only for your visit, but for sharing your experience here on TripAdvisor, it's lovely to achieve our guest's satisfaction.  Hope to see you soon!  E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Cheerful stay
review: Centrally located! Close to every sightseeing spot (Sagarada, parc guell, las ramblas,....). Very clean, staff very friendly & available!  Highly recommende for either families or couples and even a group of friends!

title: Thank you Ayre Hotel Caspe for a wonderful stay
review: We have just returned from our second visit to the Ayre Hotel Caspe and we certainly were not disappointed.  Our room was large and comfortable with excellent en suite facilities.  The hotel is in a great area, near the Arc de Triomf where there are plenty of good places to visit within walking distance but it is away from the huge crowds at La Rambla (although still within walking distance) which we personally prefer to avoid.  The breakfast was great with plenty of choice.  Most importantly for us, though, the atmosphere of friendliness and helpfulness was probably the best we have experienced.  The manager Pablo is a super guy and has an excellent team.  Sandra in the restaurant greeted us as old friends (having remembered us from our visit two years before) and could not do…

title: Great place to stay in Barcelona
review: Dear Peyiotis,  Thank you so much for demonstrate your fidelity! Giving us the chance to host you twice, shows that our work is well done!  Both Sandras and Pablo are so pleased to see your review, as well as all our teams. Thank you so much for taking a moment in evaluate our job.  Hope to continue having your presence here in Barcelona, it will be our pleasure to be your point of reference!  See you soon!  E. García - Community  Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: OK
review: All of the staff I had contact with were extremely friendly and helpful.  Breakfast was excellent.  The rooms were spacious and clean.  This was a good location within easy walking distance of most of the sites of Barcelona.  It is in a quiet, safe neighborhood.  The gym equipment is dated but everything else was great.

title: Ayre Hotel
review: Thank you so so much sph! It's been our pleasure to host you during your pass through Barcelona, and we will be honoured to do it again.   Please don't hesitate in contacting us for anything you might consider necessary!  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great little gem
review: This hotel was comfortable enough. I have no complaints about my bedroom, which was clean and reasonably well kitted out.  I believe the hotel had a gym, but this wasn't really necessary when both lifts were out of order at the same time. It felt like enough of a workout walking up the stairs to my room the 5th floor. Thankfully they had them fixed reasonably quickly, but it's a shame they couldn't have somehow managed to fix one before the other one broke.  Breakfast was very good with a nice selection of hot and cold dishes.  The bar did a pretty good sangria, although the barman looked like he didn't really want to be there, which spoiled the ambience a bit.

title: Idea; location
review: Approx 20 mins walk to Plaza Cataluna, easy to get to on the train from the airport. Rooms were basic, modern and very clean, similar in style to Premier Inns here. Staff were friendly and helpful. We had breakfast here which was buffet style and good value There is dinner available but we ate out, It was a great place to stay for a City Break as it was far enough out to be quiet, but easy access to transport to see the sights. We will definitely stay here again if we return to Barcelona as it was great and reasonably priced

title: Boutique Hotel 5 Star
review: Dear SaddleBags,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for sharing your experience on Tripadvisor. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Nice hotel
review: This hotel was more than I expected. This hotel is located perfectly, it's clean, the staff is ABSOLUTELY AMAZING they go above and beyond the call of duty. This hotel should be a 5 star considering the cost and service. The breakfast is delicious with many options to chose from and you can order from a menu as well. I highly recommend!

title: Not a fan
review: Wow! Amanda!  Thank you so much for such those lovely words towards us! Our goal is to share happy moments, and we hit it!  We hope and desire to become your point of reference in your visit to Barcelona and many other cities in Spain! Don't hesitate in contacting us for anything you might need about it.  Greetings! And hugs :)  E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Cheap Boutique Hotel
review: Room, breakfast and staff were great!  Staff was friendly and extremely helpful!  Was a 15 min walk from Arc de Triomf.  Away from major tourist spots, walked back from the beach one night in about 30 min.  Overall very nice place.

title: Great hotel
review: Very friendly staff and they were very accommodating of our party. 10 cyclists at the end of a trip from France. Hotel allowed us to take bikes to rooms to allow us to dismantle and box ready for flight back. Many hotels on the trip would not allow this !! Good clean rooms. Helpful staff air conditioned rooms. A modern hotel but it is a little out of the centre. I did notice it was within walking distance to the basilica. Recommended

title: Very nice hotel, but location not TOO central
review: Dear Graham,   Thank you so much for such prompt review on us!!! I hope we can be your point of reunion when on trip to Barcelona, and of course the rest of Spain!  Hope to guest you soon,   Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: "Wonderful staff make this hotel shine"
review: This is a very nice, clean hotel. Spacious & modern rooms. The location is...okay. Close to Arc de Triomphe but not really conveniently located close to anything else. It's walkable, but...it's a walk. Overall, pretty nice hotel but I wouldn't stay here again because other hotels in the same price range have better locations.

title: Good modern, quiet 4 star hotel
review: Dear J.S.,   We are so glad to have had you as our guest. We appreciate you've chosen us between all the possibilities Barcelona offers, more than 180 4 stars hotels in the city.   I hope and desire we can have the chance to guest you once more, maybe in another of our hotels not only in Barcelona, but in the rest of Spain.  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Close but quiet
review: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for two nights based on its location and online reviews regarding cleanliness and quietness. The gracious front desk clerks really were what made this hotel exceptional though. Cristian,was always there to help with a smile. He anticipated what we needed before even asking, with great information about restaurants,places of interest and directions. He was really a great asset to the hotel and demonstrates that he loves what he does! Jonatan was also very helpful.The restaurant dinner was delicious with a great pasta dish that my husband enjoyed and a wonderful tuna salad that I had. The hotel was spotless with exceptional housekeeping staff.

title: Welcoming short break
review: We visited this hotel in Barcelona for a few days. The welcome was very warm, and Armen on reception was extremely informative. The rooms were spacious and clean, as well a being very comfortable. Nothing was too much trouble, we felt comfortable to ask about anything, we were given great advice about using the metro too. The breakfasts were amazing, with both continental and cooked available. Our only small query, was that the bar wasn't opened to residents after 11.00pm. All round a great place to stay.

And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day. title: Recommended hotel, 10 mins walk from Sagrada Familia. Top Service / great breakfast
review: Large double rooms .. complete bathroom "goodies" (shampoo etc.) reception very helpful, friendly staff. Breakfast  .... the works !!!!!  Would certainly recommend hotel to friends/ those thinking of visiting Barcelona.

title: Excellent Service
review: I have been travelling all over the world, more than a thousand nights at hotels, this one stands out as one of the very best,  Friendly and service minded staff, great breakfast even with guiding the first morning !!  Nice rooms in a relatively quiet district, good beds, nice bathroom. Walking duistance to he center and only 10 mins walk to the Sagrada Familia, Gaudi's must see church in Barceona.

title: 3 night
review: The location is good, but we didn't like the toilets , the bed didnt fit for my husband and i (we are normal size ) we asked about biger bed put they said this is what we have,The breakfast is horrible don't try it thers no options

title: Can't fault this hotel
review: Dear Duaa,   Thank you so much for choosing us, considering the huge offer we dispose in a city like Barcelona. We appreciate we had the chance to guest you.  By the other hand, we regret we were not able to reach your expectations. We have different kind of rooms, and we give our guests the chance to choose them, depending on the daily availiability, and be sure that our staff will do whatever they have in their hands to make your visit memorable.  We understand you didn't appreciate the variety we offer for the buffet breakfast. We took the proper note to make an effort to improve it even more, altough we (as many other visitors) consider it worth to start the day with energy.  Hope we can have another chance to revert this image you had and make your stay as good as you imagine.  Greetings from Barcelona,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: It could have been great
review: This hotel is in a good, quiet location with access to a couple of 10 minute walk Metro stations.  The rooms are very clean and are spacious enough with a large bed and plenty of storage room.  Breakfast was really good, with plenty of choose from and friendly staff on hand.

title: GREAT CENTRAL LOCATION
review: Dear Matt,   Thank you so much for such those lovely words!  Greetings from Barcelona,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Seriously disappointment!
review: This hotel is well positioned to start visiting some of the main attractions. It is quiet at night. Rooms were impeccably clean, and housekeeping excelent. Bar service good. We had the chance of very good weather, and everything could have been perfect if it hadn't been for this incident: we opted for 2 nights with breakfast included, but when arriving at reception in the afternoon, in order to check in, the person at the desk told us that on is computer breakfast wasn't mentioned. He printed the booking and gave it to us. We didn't book directly with the hotel, but with a booking site, so we thought they might have made a mistake. But at a closer look we noticed that if we added up the price of the rooms per each night with no breakfast, we got a different final amount than…

title: Early April sightseeing visit
review: We found the staff in the hotel excellent.  On arrival, the air conditioning in the room was not working - we were very quickly offered another room but had to accept a twin rather than a double bed.  Our room was spacious and clean, the towels being changed every day.  The buffet breakfast was extensive and good quality, the restaurant staff being particularly helpful, polite and pleasant.  The hotel was situated a short walk away from a Metro station which was helpful.  The Wi-Fi in the room was sometimes intermittent but the reception staff would always help out with booking on their computers.  All in all, we were very pleased with our stay.

title: Premier Inn or Travelodge!!!
review: Dear Pam,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for sharing your sensations with the Tripadvisor community. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Clean, friendly, efficient
review: Average hotel which is on par with a Premier Inn or Travelodge, more 3 stars than 4! Room was basic, no tea or coffee facilities.   Bathroom requires upgrading.   Wi-Fi in room temperamental. Breakfast could be improved.  On a positive, hotel is located within easy walking distance of both Barcelona Port & Centre.

title: Lovely jorney in April
review: Dear Alamo1977,  Thank you for choosing us to spend some days in this lovely city.  We regret we were not able to fulfill your expectations, we hope we can surprise you in a future visit, maybe in another Ayre Hotel not only in Barcelona, but also in many points of Spain.  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great hospitality. Considerate and very welcoming
review: We don't look for much in a hotel, just the three items in the title.  Ayre does them well (you will be surprised how many do not).  Fast, efficient check-in. Spacious, clean room. Large selection available for the well-stocked breakfast buffet.  Hotel is located in a quiet, relaxed neighbourhood, within walking distance to, well, everything. If it is not within walking distance, you are still within a five-minute walk of the subway.  Quite a few supermarkets within one block, and an organic food supermarket right across the street.

title: Barcelona Hotel
review: Great room, was cleaned very well each day. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Hotel is in a good location within easy walking distance to major attractions. The breakfasts were great and for the additional cost on the daily room rate were very good value.

title: Good hotel downtown Barcelona
review: Dear Pagez01,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! title: Great value
review: Easy to reach the hotel is 10 min walk far from Placa Cataluna in a relaxed quarter of Barcelona. Clean and modern my room was big enough for leaving well three days with a nice bathroom. Absolute silence at night. Breakfast with a wide choice of fresh food, both salted and sweet. Fair price.

title: Nice hotel, Great location, highly recommend
review: Dear Marco,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! title: Lovely hotel
review: Stayed at this hotel for a 3 night break. Very good location, great housekeeping. Didn't have breakfast so can't comment on that. Just wish we'd stayed longer! Excellent value for money wouldn't hesitate to return!

title: Lovely hotel
review: Great sized rooms with lovely facilities (bath, shower over bath and a walk in shower, full length mirror, good lighting, comfortable beds, wardrobe, fridge with complimentary water).   Also only a short five minute walk to Arc de Triomf metro station which is only two stops from Catalunya station (the centre of the city). Reception staff were friendly and helpful providing us with advice about the metro and airport transfers.  Would definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Excellent
review: Thank you MissNice93 for your visit and lovely review!  Hope to guest you once and miles more in a near future.  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Nice conference hotel
review: I been on the hotel for 4 days I have a wonderful break, the hotel I find very modern, cleaner, offer very good wifi, gym, reading room, massage, recreation  room, bycicle loan selection of drinks and food, staff are so friendly and helpful to all customer in particular young guy called  Marc a the reception very friendly I will be back in this hotel very soon love all your staff at hotel Ayer caspe 😘😘

title: City Break
review: Dear Stefano,   We're so happy to achieve our main goal: share happy moments.   Your words towards us are so nice and stylish, thank you so much!  Hope to see you again soon, not only in Barcelona, but in the rest of Spain, we'll be glad to guest you on every Ayre Hotel present on 6 different cities.  Greetings,   E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Very well located
review: Stayed here for one week on a course about foodinspection. Very good service and very helpful staff, very good breakfast and a very nice hotel, overall. Good conferece facilities. About 10 min walk to city center.

title: Brilliant stay
review: We stayed here as a couple for 2 nights in early February. The hotel, staff and facilities were brilliant. The breakfast was exceptional and each member of staff went out their way to make our stay memorable and easy.

title: it would have been a five...
review: Dear Luke  We're delighted for this review. Thank you so much!  Hope we can guest you once and miles more.  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great hotel
review: The hotel is accessible tp the aerobus from the airport with a little walking. It is very close to the Arc de Triompe, Sagrada Familia and Plaza Cataluna. The room is very modern and since Barcelona was very cold, they tended to check the room temperature which was great. The breakfast is a pleasure with so many food choices. Surprise though, there was no coffee in the room. It should have been a five. I love it though.

title: A Christmas to remember
review: Dear Ernesto,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! title: Excellent and practical stay
review: Stayed here for 2 nights middle of January, got a great price so weren't sure what to expect but the place was excellent , staff were very helpful , hotel was clean and stylish. Didn't eat in the hotel as location was ideal for getting about either waking or public transport.

title: Great Location!
review: On arrival I found the reception staff to be cold and a little snooty.  The rooms were clean and modern, practical and suited the purpose given what we paid. The toiletries were nice.  We arrived quite late on the first night so ate in the bar/cafeteria. The food was quirky, but super cheap. Bright lights made it feel a little like a work canteen, but actually, it was a great stop. We all ate our food with enjoyment and went to bed feeling relaxed. The bar offered a really excellent selection of gins, wines and other beverages and the prices were very reasonable - the cheapest we found in the whole of Barcelona.  The breakfast buffet was a treat. Great bread selection, delicious pastries and a healthy array of hot and cold to suit all palates.  The hotel is situated in a…

title: Well located hotel for a good price!
review: Dear Su  Thank you so much for your visit Barcelona, and for sharing your experience with Tripadvisor's community.  We appreciate all your comments, and we took the proper note about them.  Hope in your next visit you can find all the warm welcome that characterizes us.  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Just a few tweaks would make it really 4*
review: I visited this hotel with my partner for 3 nights at the beginning of January.  We were overall very pleased with our stay.  The hotel is very clean and we liked how there were 2 showers as well as a bath in our room as this made getting ready a lot easier! The room was plain but nice with a comfortable bed.  The staff were polite and helpful, and we were really pleased with the fact they let us leave our luggage in the hotel for a day after we had checked out as our flight was late at night.  We didn't eat in the hotel so cannot comment on that but the restaurant looked nice.   The location was great, just a 15 minute walk from La Sagrada Familia and about a 30 minute walk from the beach (we walked through the arc de triomf and the parc de ciutadella which was lovely!).  Also…

title: Home away from home
review: Dear Robertsonlia3,  We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Excellent Hotel in the Middle of Barcelona
review: Can't complain at the location. Really easy to walk or get the metro all around Barcelona. The room was lovely.. Good heating/air conditioning system. Free shampoo etc, hair dryer, fridge with complimentary water, BUT needed tea and coffee making facilities. I hate getting up without my morning coffee and these days I do expect this facility in the room. There are two levels of breakfast. The €4 and the €13. The cheaper one is available in the cafeteria and is basically orange juice, coffee and a piece of toast. The €13 euro is a buffet in a roped off dining room and it was very varied and beautifully presented. The staff were lovely and helpful and we really can't fault the breakfast - hot, cold, fruit, pastries, bread, toast etc. However, the hotel states it has a restaurant…

title: Modern, Friendly Staff, Spacious. Read my review regarding breakfast
review: We Stayed here for two nights in December for our xmas party.  The rooms are nice and spacious and have a good sized bathroom and storage cupboards.  The Bathroom has both a stand alone shower and a bath so you have the choice of what you would like. It's always a nice touch when a Hotel gives you free complementory bath products. My only BAD point is that we stayed in room 201 that faced the inside of the hotel (we had no exterior window) The second floor that we were on and room 201 is directly above reception/lobby and the ceiling is glass so all the light comes up and comes directly into the room. (you can see from the pictures what I mean) This may not be a problem for some people but if you are like my partner she likes a blacked out room when trying to sleep and the…

title: Would certainly stay here again
review: Dear Aaron,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Including breakfast or not, the price will be always different. Breakfast have a surcharge of €13 per person and per day, and probably during the booking session on Booking.com, more than once will be asked to include it or not.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Amazing
review: After being a bit apprehensive about booking the Ayre Hotel Caspe it turned out to be a great decision. The area around the hotel is full of great places to eat and drink, much better than you will ever find around the main tourist areas. The hotel itself is clean, the rooms are very good and the staff by and large friendly and very helpful, a special mention to Miguel in the bar who was especially good! Will certainly stay here again when we return to Barcelona.

title: It was just ok...
review: Dear Grit1  Thank you so much for your visit and review, we're delighted with it.  Hope to see you soon!  E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Nice hotel but poor food
review: We stayed there for 5 nights, it's a very clean hotel, we got a clean room and a comfy bed, staff were extremely helpful, it's 20 mins walk to Catalunia square, it's 5 mins walk to two metro stations different lines. Many Supermarkets and coffeshops are very near to the hotel. Only things that breakfast is expensive we didn't try it, we asked for a tea spoon to make coffee but they charged us for it and it was weired. I would definetely stay there again.

title: Superior staff
review: The hotel staff is great. So willing to help at any giving time. Cristian at the front desk and the skinny girl with the bob hair cut at the restaurant were fantastic. The hotel is located between Plaza Caraluña and Sagrada Familia, closer to the church than to the plaza.  It is a good 15-20 min walk to the plaza. Other choices are public transportation within a block. The hotel itself is nice and clean. Modern style, a good 4eu small breakfast. I will consider this hotel if ever back in Barcelona. No carpet, light corridors.

title: Good and central hotel
review: Dear Elespia  Thank you so much for your visit, and for your comments (and rating!!!).  Don't hesitate in contacting us when you plan to return to Barcelona, we'll be glad to guest you once more.  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Very very good
review: Spacious rooms, good 4 star hotel. The breakfast buffet is not exceptional and the design is a bit boring, but altogether this is a good business hotel, very central and very convenient for a group (we were 40 people).

title: Good hotel
review: Thank you so much Gui, hope to see you again soon.  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great stay! Front desk super helpful
review: I was amazed how convenient this hotel is. It is very good. The rooms are amazing, food is excellent and the service is very hepful and kind. Hotel is situated very near a lot of Barcelona highlights.

title: Very good, comfortable and near to centre
review: Small hotel, very clean, very comfortable. Free wifi and safe box. Small bar for snacks and a breakfast room, a gym (never used) in the basement. Very attentive staff, they went out of their way to assist. Only downside would be cooked breakfast could be a little warmer.

title: Excellent
review: Dear TjNiloc,   Thank you so much for your visit and cooperation with this review. I hope in your next visit you could find everything perfect as you deserve.  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Sleek, Modern, Comfortable & Very Pleasant Staff
review: Just been for a 5 day stop in this hotel. Staff all very friendly. This hotel had everything you could wish for apart from tea making facilities. I asked for the use of an iron on booking in. Sure enough a knock at the door and iron and board duly delivered to use the entire stay. Very very clean and modern. Breakfast buffet very diverse food for all nationalities. As well as hot food on the buffet there was separate items that were cooked to order. Loads of bars restaurants pharmacist and supermarket nearby. Metro station less than 10 mins walk away. Bus stop opposite hotel. Excellent location for all you need.

title: A nice hotel but lots of problems.
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your lovely words, i hope we can offer you the best accomodation in town once more.  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Good stay but rude staff
review: My partner and I stayed at the Ayre hotel at the end of August, it is about 10-15 minutes walk away from the beach and the main area around La Ramblas, 5 minutes away from the Arc de Triomf and about 5 minutes from La Sagrada Familia.  On arrival the main reception is very modern and we were welcomed by very pleasant staff on the front desk, who checked us into our room straight away even though we were a couple of hours early. They even provided us with a couple of plug adapters to charge our phones after the ones bought locally didn't work!  The 2nd night we ordered room service after a day of walking and the food was so good, and the staff member who brought it was very polite. He told me to call down when I had finished so they could come collect the tray.   The room was…

title: Lovely stay good location
review: This is a very good hotel. Its about 15 mins from La Rambla and well located for the port area.  Staff are friendly and helpful. I like the range of breakfast options. For 4€ you can have coffee juice and toast. There is also a fuller buffet.  We thought the express breakfast was good value   Rooms are very clean with comfortable beds and good bathrooms although the soap was a bit small.  I would definitely recommend and stay here again.

title: Enjoyable Stay
review: Dear ArgentineTango,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Far from everything
review: The hotel is conveniently located, just 5 min walk to two metro stations. The room was clean and comfortable. The staff were very friendly and helpful. During our stay we had to change our room and the hotel personnel moved our stuff while we were away. We found everything in a perfect order in the better room when we came back. Overall it was very enjoyable stay in Barcelona and the hotel provides very good quality service.

title: Good location for Sagrada Familia
review: Dear HawaHawai87  Thank you so much not only for your presence, but also for sharing your experience between Tripadvisor's community.  As you might be aware, issues and incidents may occur, or even that the room is not what you expected to be, but, as you mentioned, our staff is always ready to assist and improve the quality of your stay.  Hope to see you again soon!  Greetings,   E. García - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Bright clean hotel
review: The hotel was ok, but it was so far from all of the Main sites. The bus ride into town took about 40 minutes each way which cut into our touring time. Would recommend a hotel closer to the heart of the sites for first time visitors like myself. Please not, my stay was back in January when it was cold and a little rainy so that didn't help.

title: Nice hotel in a good location, with very friendly staff
review: Staff was great, very friendly and helpful.  Rooms very clean and roomy.  Quiet area and quite good location (close to Sagrada Familia and to the Tetuan/Arc de Triomf metro station).  There were some room card issues (they were deactivated after only a couple of days and we had to go to the reception and redo them).   Also, one night (around 4 AM) someone entered our room without knowing that we're inside. It was quickly resolved by the reception office.  The city tax is not included and has to be paid at the checkout.

title: Solid four star hotel
review: Thank you Mihai for your review!   Please forgive us for the room and roomkey issues, we had some technical issues and for some reason we had those problems.   I desire in your next visit, you can enjoy Barcelona without being disturbed.   Greetings, Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Clean, stylish and modern hotel
review: Ayre is a four star hotel and everything is according to expectation. Staff and cleanin service were very nice and professional and did a great job. Breakfast was good quality and variety seein as this is a relatively small hotel but nothing was missing. Rooms were clean and relatively new and extra touch was both bath and a shower. Quite happy!

title: Clean, modern and comfortable.
review: Dear Branko,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Super modern and clean with a great location for people not afraid to walk
review: We stayed over a week at this most pleasant hotel. The rooms are great, the neighbourhood is lovely and they have the most friendly staff. Really clean, modern and stylish hotel, great breakfast and the location is great and you have everything in a walking distance without being in the busiest part of the city. Our room even had a bathtub and various settings on the air condition and complimentary cold water bottles in the minibar at arrival which was nice arriving in the hot weather. Thank you and I will recommend to anyone and hopefully stay again!

title: Good location, very close to the Sagrada Familla
review: We stayed at this hotel on our last day in Spain.  We were traveling on an organized tour.  The hotels location was really great.  It's very close to the Sagrada Familla, also close to several metro stations.  It's a slightly longer walk to the Gothic quarter or to the Placa Catalunya but still pretty close.  The hotel is very modern in design and on a quite street.  Our room was big and comfortable.  The bathroom was big with a separate shower and tub.  One extra plus was the bottles of water in the mini fridge were included.  The breakfast buffet was very good.

title: Nice hotel with convenient location
review: Dear Loudini,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Lovely hotel and great location
review: Stayed one night after Mediterranean cruise. Hotel was clean and amenities were as promised. Hotel staff was very pleasant and helpful.  Travelled with 2 teens and wifi was very important to them and it worked flawlessly!  ; )  We ordered room service late in the evening and it was delivered in a timely manner and was very good.  Would definitely stay here again!!!

title: Close to Segrada de Familia
review: Dear Michael,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Average
review: We had a really pleasant stay here.  On arrival we were offered the choice of an 'outside' view with two single beds or a double room with windows facing the lobby.   I would definitely recommend requesting an outdoor view, the two single beds were not an issue at all, they were already pushed together and the rooms were modern, spacious and spotless!  The room service was excellent and the staff were all lovely and friendly.  Location is ideal, only a 15/20 minute walk to the gothic quarter and even closer to Segrada de Familia! Would highly recommend staying here.

title: Good location and great hotel
review: The hotel staff were all friendly and helpful, including the bar staff who kept the bar open a little longer for our late arrival.  The rooms were very comfortable and spacious, clean and immaculate.  We walked from the hotel to all of the main attractions in the city which was not too bad, if you don't mind walking.  The public transport was easy to use too.  We used the underground a couple of times and only bought one card with 10 uses on it, which we used between 4 of us.  The food at the hotel was good, we only had the bar snacks but they were delicious, although small portions.

title: Excellent stay
review: Dear Cal,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day. title: Strange little hotel
review: Fantastic hotel, the staff were very friendly and helpful and the room was clean and comfortable. We had no problems. Can't comment about the hotel's restaurant as we ate out every day, there being many great cafes and restaurants nearby. Not too far from the centre of town, it's about a 10-15 minute walk or there is the metro station nearby.

title: 3 stars
review: Thank you so much Charlotte for giving us the chance to host you in your trip to this astonishing city, Barcelona.  Thank you, as well, for your sweet comments.  ¡Hope we can see you again soon!  Greetings,   E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Welcoming staff
review: Stayed here for three nights with my wife. The hotel was clean, quiet, and the location was pretty good. We had no trouble walking to/through the old city and la Rambla, though it was certainly farther than I expected.  The beds were moderately comfortable. However, there were a few things that we found strange about the hotel: 1. There was a "master switch" by the door than was switched by dropping your room key into it. I think the idea was that you grabbed your key on the way out to ensure that you did not leave any lights on. Unfortunately, the AC also turned off when you did this, so the room was quite warm upon returning. 2. Our king-size bed was just two twins pushed together. Both beds were made up individually, so it wasn't really like sleeping in one bed. 3. We only…

title: Very wise choise
review: I stayed at this hotel because my wife was attending a seminar and all participants were lodged here. It turned out to be a perfect basis to explore Barcelona (two metro stations close by, although it is not too far from the old town to walk), but also very confortable to take a break and relax a little bit. The rooms are clean and confortable and feel very modern. The staff was nice, friendly and helpful. Breakfast has room for improvement (in terms of choice), but it still is a pretty good one.

review: Dear CiscoPinto,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day. title: Lovely hotel!
review: My husband and I had a wonderful time in Barcelona this April, but more so, we feel your staff are very special as shown by the kindness given to us. We stayed at Ayre Hotel 2 nights this April. As we left very early at 3 AM to get to the airport for trip back to San Francisco, I inadvertently left my camera in the room. We did not have the opportunity to turn back to retrieve it. It was an old tech camera, of not much value, but I was sad as all our wonderful Spain tour photos were in the camera. Back home, I emailed the hotel with hopes to get my precious photos.  Senor Esteban Garcia responded within a day or two and to my delight they found a way to upload my photos which I was able to retrieve. Further, he sent the SD via mail in a well sealed brown envelope and a nice…

title: Enjoyable stay at Ayre Hotel Caspe
review: Dear Ann Marie  As we said in our mail, we try always to share happy moments, even when our guests arrives home. And this was the best chance to affirm that.  I'm so happy we have left a nice and sweet memory of your trip to Barcelona, and i desire to be your host on your return to this lovely city.  Thank you for such an enormous gratitude and kindness.  Greetings from Barcelona,   E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe :)

title: Ideal for a quiet base
review: Glad we chose this hotel, brilliant location for the rest of barcelona as it was pretty much in the middle. The metro stop wasnt to far either about 5min walk. The staff were lovely, could speak very good english. They cleaned our room every day! Couldnt fault this hotel at all.

title: Hmmm...breakfast elsewhere.
review: We booked the Ayre Caspe as it was claimed as being central - in fact it's a 20 minute walk to the centre, which for us was fine, considering we intended to explore on foot anyway.  The lobby and room are very clean, modern, crisp, nice furniture and the shower is modern and a great design. I wanted somewhere with a gym. It has one, sure, almost passable, though on closer inspection the equipment is poorly maintained, loose bolts, wobbly peddles, etc. I used it once only. We arrived to BCN late, tired and hungry, and greeted at the hotel reception desk by two lovely young guys. They offered us an upgrade at €22 a night - King bed, full toiletry set (nothing to write home about), ironing board, free wifi, kettle, free minibar (only on arrival, 1 beer, no milk for the scarce tea /…

title: Nice place to stay with good location
review: Dear Mila.   I'd like to thank you choose us to spend some days in this lovely city, and i hope you can give us the chance to recover your trust in us. Your comments towards our teams and facilities are so kind. Thank you again! On the other hand, i guess you expected more from us, and i regret that. A lot. We work very hard everyday to keep everything up-to-date, and mantain our standards as much high as we can. I see we were not able to satisfy you. Breakfast is one of the most important meals of the day, and we are aware of that, paying all the attention it deserves. The products you've mentioned, can be ordered and they will be made in the moment, only YOU will enjoy them. The same products placed in the buffet are a backup for those people with not enough time to wait, but this is not an excuse to keep them not in an optimal state as we always have them. Regarding windows, allow me to confirm ours are under strict municipal regulations, and they CAN be opened, but in a small portion for safety reasons. I feel sad we were not able to identify this in time to advise it to you. Don't hesitate in contacting us for anything you might need, we will be so happy if you give us another chance to be your point of reference in Barcelona.  Greetings, E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel caspe

title: Modern, good for a short stay
review: Room was cozy and clean and the personnel was helpful and friendly. We had breakfast included and it was good. The location was great, only about 15 mins walk to both Las Ramblas and Sagrada Familia. Many shops and small restaurants in the vicinity and nearest metro station Tetuan two blocks from the hotel.

title: Great value and location
review: This hotel is very well located, 2 stations away from las ramblas, in a quiet neighborhood but you can find many bars amd restaurants around the corner. The hotel has a modern design and all the basic amenities. The buffet is nice, and also offers breakfast express. The only thing i found a pity is that the water is only free the first night and later is charged. Not a big issue because you have a small market right in the front across the street :)

title: a nice hotel close to the centre of Barcelona
review: The hotel is nothing extraordinary, but offers all you need: simple modern decor, very clean, comfortable beds, both a shower and a bathtub. Free good wi-fi. The hotel price is quite reasonable but the breakfast seems over-priced for the quality it offers. All in all recommended for a visit to Barcelona.

title: Hotel has everything you need
review: Dear Mariusz,   Thank you so much for being here with us, not only as our guest, but also as a Barcelona visitor.  Thank you as well for your words and ratings. Please excuse us, by the other hand, if our breakfast had not fulfulled your expectations. Buffet has a large selection of fresh fruit, different kinds of milk, Nespresso Coffee, hams and cheeses, first quality yoghurt, different kinds of bread (even gluten-free), cava, natural squeezed orange juice, and the best option: hot dishes made at the moment, only for you. Anyway we consider every opinion is a gift and we will put an extra effort to improve it.  Best regards,   E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Quit Hotel
review: Recently stayed at the Ayre Hotel Caspe 29/3-2/4 and enjoyed our stay. Rooms very clean and spacious. Located in a quiet neighbourhood and only 15-20 minute walk to the likes of Placa de Catalunya and Sagrada La Familia. Comfortable beds, with free safe and WiFi. Bathroom has separate shower and bath. Our room was changed each day we were there with clean towels provided each time. Also the first time, housekeeping spotted our books and left us a lovely message with bookmarks, that was a nice touch. Reception staff were great and provided us with some good recommendations for dinner. Had drink in bar one night and staff also very nice, provided free nibbles. All in all, this hotel is highly recommended for a stay in Barcelona.

title: Ayre Caspe Hotel
review: This Hotel is located near Metro station Art de Triomf and Bus Terminal Barcelona North. Buy either a 10 trip-card or for several days. It is a quiet street with very low noise. The Hotel is an older one not a 4 stars hotel but more a 3 stars hotel. The room was nice, clean and fine. We had problems getting the heat-system down and English channel on the Tv is preferably. The reception is friendly and very helpful.

title: Nice hotel
review: Room was clean,nicely decorated and bed was very comfortable.only hair conditioner should be included (even after asking for it,nothing was done)breakfast was great.location is ok,we could walk everywhere.metro station is near,not more than 5 minutes of walking.

title: Nice hotel, quite un-central though
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your comments.   We are working to improve our services and your opinion is important for this matter.   Regards  Victor Burgues - Dpto de Recepción.

title: Comfortable and good location
review: Nice hotel. Rooms are not super-new yet spacious. Air conditioning was noisy and ineffective, window was small. Polite staff, quick reception, mild level of cleanliness. Didn't use breakfast, there are some places around (like Petit Princeps) cheap and excellent. Position is the main hurdle, quite far from city-life with public transport

title: Modern, clean, great location and neighbourhood
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your comments. We are working to improve our services and your opinion is important for this matter.  We hope to se you again in our hotel and try our breakfast buffet. Regards  Victor Burgues - Dpto de Recepción.

title: Amazing hotel
review: Very comfortable hotel. Staff is friendly and helpful. Breakfast is adequate. We ate the buffet each morning but they do offer a small menu that you can have made to order. WiFi is free but not fast. Streaming video such as Netflix is possible if you are patient and are willing to watch in less than full HD resolution. Location is good. Many of the city's attractions are located just one or two Metro stations away, although the hotel is situated about equidistant from two stations which are slightly more than what I would consider a short walk away. Overall, we were satisfied and would certainly stay here again.

title: Great location
review: The location is great, only a 15min walk to the city center (Plaça de Catalunya).  Opposite the hotel is an organic grocery store (closed on Sun) with a wide range of stuff. Breakfast was not included in my room rate, but is available by paying extra for a buffet (which I did not do - enjoyed the tapas in the city).  Also I upgraded to a Superior Room which had parking included, rather than spending extra EUR 16 on the normal room rate. For this I then received a spacious room, very big bathroom and a bit of a view. What was a bit annoying was the music they play in the hallway, however they turned it much down on the 2nd and 3rd night I was there (without complaining!). Also that the TV only had Spanish channels. That's why no 5 stars. Wifi was good in the room, it also had a…

title: Excellent location, first-class service
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for such lovely review. We are so pleased to see our work is recognized in this way.  Excuse us if your first night our BGM was disturbing, and i'm pleased we solve it fast.  We will be so delighted if you return to visit us, please contact us for whatever might be necessary, we're at your entire disposal.  Greetings from Barcelona,   E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Just very good
review: The hotel was in a very good location.  My wife and I were on a 4-day sightseeing trip and we were able to walk to all of the attractions we wanted to visit, including the Sagrada Familia, La Perdara, La Rambla, the port, the Cathedral, the Gothic Quarter and the Olympic Village.  Our room was spacious and well-equipped although, surprisingly, there was no kettle.  Everything was spotlessly clean and well-maintained.  All the staff we dealt with were very helpful, polite and friendly and we didn't get much opportunity to practice our Spanish as everyone spoke very good English.  The range of foods on offer at breakfast was very good.

title: clean, good location,
review: In an excellent location just a few blocks from the city centre and old Gothic quarter, this modern hotel is very comfortable and very reasonably priced.  It has underground, secure parking, gymnasium and the bedrooms are well equipped.  The staff are super helpful and all seem to speak English.  We would stay there again without hesitation.

title: 5 Day break
review: Just returned from a 5 day trip to Barcelona staying at Ayre Hotel Caspe.  Hotel was just as described, only issue was not kettle for tea or coffee making, other than that good.  Easy to get around from hotel as well.

review: The place is located near la plaza cataluña, ramblas & la sagrada familia. You can walk to these places without a problem. We really like the place. It's very modern, clean and was Totally worth the staying. We highly recommend it. I just posted two pictures of our room.

title: Comfortable Hotel in the middle of Barcelona
review: Stayed for a business conference in the east of the city. The location is good, the old city is about 20 minute walk, and the beach another 10 from that. The entrance and reception has some character, but the rooms are very plain. Fine for business travel. Spacious and very clean, friendly staff. There is a restaurant attached. €12 for buffet breakfast or €4 for small breakfast which is ok.   There is a gym but it's very small. There's a taxi rank 2 minute walk from the hotel, and they ordered me a taxi for early in the morning to the airport. I think the reception is open 24/7.   I wouldn't recommend this for couples as the bedrooms are a bit basic with not much style. Good for business travel though or solo.

title: Good (but wifi is horrible)
review: Clean and nice staff. Well located and breakfast was good as well.  The only complain is related to the wifi (not so good), reason why I am giving 4 stars. But if you are not worried about Internet, it should be a good option. Neighborhood there is also calm, different than other hotels in the center (specially during the summer).
