Greetings from Barcelona,  E. Garcia Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com

title: Very good
review: Hotel is at a central location, but quiet. Well, we stayed at the 7th floor. There is a reasonable door to door sound insulation, which is not obvious in many Spanish places. Bed is giant, but You have to sleep in a Mediterranean pocket style blanket as always in this country. The room price was reasonable, indeed. Close to everything, even to metro or rail. You do not have to have a cab to and from the airport, Arc de Triomph Rodelias rail station is nearby. Well, You have to change at Sants, but the whole travel time is 35 min only, like the taxi. HolaBCN travelcard valid to the airport rail, too.

title: Awesom location!!!
review: The hotel has a good location - not far from Plaza Catalunya and also not very far from Sagrada Familia (both ca. 20 mins by walk).  Checkin and checkout were fast and without any complications. The staff was nice and helpful. Our room was also nice and big. What I didnt like was a not perfectly clean bathroom - you look at it and it's ok, but you see it could be cleaner and cleaned better. However, I don't want to complain - this hotel was very OK in comparison to other hotels we were told about by our friends.

title: Nice moderately modern hotel
review: Nice hotel and a very centralized location to the metro and cafés.  The staff was moderately friendly and many had a good command of the English language. The rooms were sizable for European hotel rooms and was moderately priced. The rooms had a modern Decore and were clean and comfortable.   The only drawback is that the rooms did not come with the coffee/tea maker nor was there coffee in the lobby despite there being a coffee machine that was hidden not in use.  There was also a computer with a printer in the lobby but the printer did not work properly and the staff was not helpful and printing out sightseeing or airport boarding passes    Would give the hotel 3.5 if available rather than four.

title: Small hotel with good staffs

I also regret that we have not been attentive to offer help to print cards or tickets if the printer was not available internet corner. In general terms and always considering the workflow, the reception staff is always available for such needs.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com

title: business class hotel
review: From the airport to the hotel, without traffic , would be about 20mins. Taxi fare ranges from 34Euros to 45Euros.   Upon arriving , please do not judge it too quickly. Neighbourhood looks dodgy if you arrived at night. Once you see during the day , it is a safe area.    Location   Literally opposite the main entrance of the hotel, there is a mini 24hr supermarket ( supermerkat) . towards the right , slightly round the corner , you can find a big supermarket at B1 , closed at 2100hrs.   You can see a cafe at almost every corner at the street.  Towards the left , opposite, you will find Himalaya Restaurant. It serves authentic Indian food. a bit pricey tho.   A 5-6mins walk from the hotel , will get you to the Subway. From the main entrance of the hotel , if you turn right, and…

review: Excellent hotel for business or holiday in quite area. 8 blocks from the airport a1a2 centre drop off. Not a lot in the immediate area as it's residential so pack a good pair of walking shoes and a good map

title: Great modern 4 star hotel in quiet but near central location
review: Stopped here for a short leisure break.  Good location in a quiet side street, 10 mins walk from Arc de Triomf (and the Metro).  Easy walking distance to the city centre and in the opposite direction to Sagrada Familia.  Modern well furnished clean room with comfortable bed.  Common areas clean and contemporary.  Didn't try the restaurant but it looked inviting with a reasonably priced menu.  Hotel staff professional, polite and extremely helpful.  Would recommend to anyone wanting a very good value comfortable modern hotel in this wonderful city!

title: Nice hotel, with exellent breakfast
review: Our reception at the hotel about 9:30 AM was very welcoming. Our rooms were ready and they were of good size clean and quiet. We were able to have breakfast that morning at the hotel. The breakfast buffet was extensive and it was possible to order some hot items as well. We particularly liked the neighborhood as there restaurants and bakeries as well many other shops nearby. The Bari Gotic was about a 20 minute walk and the metro stop was about 10 minutes away. The hotel staff was very helpful. Wifi was good when it worked. We had difficulty getting wifi to work when 2 tablets were in use.

title: Great hotel
review: This was my second stay at Ayre Caspe. I had a great experience last time, so didn't have any reason to stay elsewhere. The hotel is well located - not too far from the Sagrada Familia, and walkable to the older part of the city, it is only a couple of blocks from the Tetuan and Arc de Triomphe Metro stations. There are a number of supermarkets and cafes nearby too.  The staff are really friendly and helpful, and the rooms and public areas are very clean. There is the use of a gym, and there is a left luggage facility if you have a later flight home. There is also a bar which is open for most of the day.  We didn't try the breakfast this time - it is 12 euros per person per day for a wide buffet selection. We had this on our first stay, and I must say that it is probably the…

title: Nice and clean hotel, nice staff
review: Dear Emma  Thank you so much for such a complete, distinguished and fascinating review. I have no words to express how proud I feel to be part of Ayre Hoteles reading this, generating happiness and will-to-return sensations on people.  I regret wi-fi was not as you would expect, so I bet in your next visit you will enjoy it.  I hope we can continue being your point of reference on your trips to Spain, and every Ayre Hotel will open their arms to your visit.  Greetings from Barcelona,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great stay!
review: When we're going to Barcelona we're normally staying at our regular hotel, but this time we decided to try a new one. We where not disappointed! The hotel was nice and clean, very quiet. Location was good but it was further away from the city than we thougt it was. However, it was quite nice not to walk out and find the street covered with tourists ;) The rooms were quite spacius and clean but the bed was horrible! If you like beds hard as conrete, you will ike this one! All over, we had a great stay!

title: Excellent hotel and friendly staff
review: We stayed in the hotel for 5 nights and found the room clean, comfortable and ideal for a short break. The staff were very helpful and friendly. title: Nice hotel nice price
review: We loved the hotel. We ate dinner and lunch in the bar a few times and loved it, food is really good, we had breakfast one day and it was really good too. The bar staff were great, the girl who worked nights was so attentive and friendly (I forget her name) she made the best sangria! the location was perfect. Wifi worked fine for me and air con was a life saver! I would highly recommend this hotel and when we come back to Barcelona we will be staying here. The bed was a little on the hard side but we got used to it, we stayed for a week and it was fine.

title: Helpful Staff
review: Although we didn't actually get to visit this hotel I have to write to thank the staff for all their help.  My husband and I were due to visit but due to his ill health 3 days before our travel date we had to cancel. My husband is disabled and we had hired some medical equipment to be in the room prior to our arrival. The hotel were excellent and went out of their way to assist us in obtaining a refund from the hire company. Great communication from them. Thank you.

title: A good nights sleep in a central location
review: Dear Purdie,   We're deeply regret that finally you couldn't been able to make the trip, I hope everything is resolved.   Part of a successful management of a hotel reservation, is preparing to it, and we are always looking the ways to learn more about our guests, so we can provide them the best possible stay, especially having special needs.   I hope ever to visit us and to finally meet you.   See you then!  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Nice hotel - watch extra charges
review: Air con, room service, a secure and clean building, nicely sized rooms with a good ensuite and safe, great location and what more could you want.. maybe more uk tv channels :) I would stay there again and would reccomend it to all couples or family's who are looking for a good nights sleep in Barcelona

title: Great hotel, great staff.
review: Dear Guest,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,   E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Convenient Hotel
review: We booked on Hotwire.   The location is nice and the rooms are clean and modern.    We did receive a nasty surprise when we checked out and were handed a bill for $300 Canadian for two rollaway beds (we had two rooms and two nights).   When we checked in we asked if the hotel provided rollaway beds and were told yes and our rollaway beds would be waiting - we should have asked about fees......

title: Family Get together :-)
review: Very good location and not too expensive. Clean modern hotel within walking distance of many of Barcelona's tourist attractions.  Friendly, helpful staff. Plenty of cafes / bars close by. Would definitely recommend.

title: Great Service
review: Dear Guest  We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city and specially for this family occasion! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Good value hotel
review: Totally amazing room, close to everything and we arrived from Australia at 930am, they got us showered and ready to go out and explore the day. While it's about a 10 mins walk away from town it's close. The rooms are large for Europe and so comfortable.

title: Ideal location
review: Dear Craig We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Nice and easy
review: “The location is great. Away from all the hustle and bustle but only 10-15 mins away from the city centre and beach. Staff are very friendly and always helpful. Comfortable rooms, very clean, good mattresses, large bathroom with good shower. Neighborhood cafes in the area for cheap breakfast and beer and snack. 10 - 20 minute to all the sites: Ramblas, port, Sagrada Familia, Arch D'Triumph and park etc...... Will definately stay here again and recommend. Good value.” Only complain I would have is wifi was very slow

title: Ideal location for GP circuit
review: nice clean, airy hotel.  Ideally situated for travelling to MotoGp circuit, as estacio del nord is a 4 min walk. Rooms are a decent size, plenty of storage space, quality toiletries, quiet air con, shower pressure good. Reception staff are friendly and knowledgeable. Buffet breakfast has a wide selection of foods and drinks.  10 minute walk to Sagrada Familia and 15 mins to place de catalunya. Would recommend a local restaurant called Vic Braseria, just round the corner. would definitely stay here again.

title: Great Return!
review: Dear Guest,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Close to Estacio Nord Bus Station
review: This was my 4th stay at this 4* hotel tucked away in the back streets near Arc De Triomphe Metro. Previously it was for business trips but this time for sightseeing. I chose this hotel as it's in a very quiet area unlike Las Ramblas & wanted to get some decent sleep at night. There was a warm welcome at reception & although arriving tired & dishevelled the computer was down so we had a light lunch of some tapas & a beer each sitting outside. Good choice as the food was nice & tasty & the beer revived us!  My room was on the 6th floor overlooking the quiet side road. Very clean room, nice flat screen tv, very comfortable bed & Free mineral water in the fridge. Nice bathroom with wet room & separate bath with hairdryer.  Top Tip; Order the continental breakfast - Fresh Orange…

title: All you need and the friendliest staff
review: Dear Mikey,   the fact that you came for business, and then have preferred the Ayre Hotel Caspe to enjoy this incredible city and relax , fills us with pride.   Thanks for visiting us again, and I hope we can see each time you visit , not only Barcelona, ​​but every city where there is a Ayre.   Thanks, also, for sharing many details with the community of Tripadvisor, especially recommendations like our express breakfast to € 4.   We hope to see you soon.  Greetings,   E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Not worth the money
review: We chose Ayre Hotel Caspe due to the closeness of the bus station as our prime reason to visit Barcelona was the motogp.  The room was totally adequate for a 4* hotel, it would have been good to have coffee making facilities but everything else was fine  We had booked bed and breakfast thus my average rating - the cost of breakfast was  12 euros per person per night. The "hot" food was cold every single morning we were there.  Whilst there was alternatives of breads fruit and cereal I dont feel it worth the price we paid.  I would stay again if for the same reason, I would however not bother with the breakfast - plenty of options in every direction out on the street.  If I were looking for a hotel whilst site-seeing in the city I would choose elsewhere to stay closer to Plaça de…

title: Great staff, average but large room
review: The hotel staff was friendly, courteous, and very helpful.  They went above and beyond when we checked into the hotel early by taking our luggage up to the room when it was ready. The rooms were very large and clean with the disappointing exception of the shower where there was black mould all over the floor (we had to wear our flip-flops). It was a great overnight stop with a decent location, and a comfortable sleep on a firm mattress.  I would consider staying here again.

title: 3days in Barcelona
review: Dear Guest, thank you very much for trusting Ayre Hotels, and hope we can keep this confidence in the future, both in Barcelona and in any of our cities with Ayre.   Please apologize if you didn't find the bathroom in perfect conditions. Bathrooms are the area most wear, and therefore we perform periodic maintenance tasks.   I hope on your next stay you enjoy your room as you deserve.  Greetings from BCN  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Pretty Comfortable For The Price
review: I have just come back from Barcelona where I stayed at this hotel. It was brilliant,rooms very clean , beds comfortable we had clean towels each day and linen changed, good air conditioning, excellent staff at reception and restaurant. The staff in restaurant understood my gluten free diet, gorgeous GF croissant.  Very close to Sagrada Familia and other attractions, but can highly recommend red tour bus. Love Barcelona so much to see and do. Will hopefully return and stay here again.

title: Moderate Hotel ...
review: Dear Caroline,   thanks for sharing your experience in the community of TripAdvisor travelers.   We try to take care of every detail to make your stay unforgettable, and the desire to meet you again.   We hope to surprise you again in the future!  Greetings from BCN,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Some good nights...
review: 10 min walking distance from some awesome markets. Pretty cheap for the price. We appreciated the separate shower and bath. Only weird thing was two separate twin beds, we would have preferred a king. Bathroom could have been a little cleaner, but no real complaints.

title: fine 4* hotel in central part of Barcelona
review: we traveled to Barcelona in April to visit church and see Gaudi works.  So sagrada familia is 10 min to walk and all major Gaudi places are in walking distance as well. Underground station in few blocks, forty minutes to the beach and half of hour to old city (ie Ramblas). Location is very good. The room (we got #705) is pretty simple but all stuff in place. Moreover there is separate tub and shower in bathroom. Noise insulation is pretty bad - ask for last door rooms. There is free wifi. Room cleaning is good and not disgruntling.

title: Great weekend
review: Dear Deniss  We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Excellent stay at a great hotel
review: Stayed here for F1 Spanish Grand Prix. Lovely hotel in a quiet position but close to attractions such as Sagrada Familia, Arc de Triomph, City park and the Old Quarter. Our room was quiet, modern, clean and spacious and we could get BBC World and Sky news so were able to keep up to date with the Election results. The shower was good and toiletries were replenished daily.Breakfast ( we payed extra) was great , lots of choice including cooked and plenty of it. The hotel and a bar and cafe but it was always very quiet- there are plenty of little bars in the surrounding streets and they are also much cheaper. Stayed here for the Spanish Grand Prix and great location for the Eustacio Nord bus station to catch a bus to the circuit - we timed it one day - only 4 mins away! Would…

title: grand prix trip
review: Dear Guest.   Thank you very much for choose us in such a particular date as the competition of F1 World Championship.  We are pleased that everything has been satisfactory and I hope you to visit us again soon.   Please apologize if you found our bar with prices slightly higher than some local places, as we established after a thorough research on the matter, and considering the comfort of the hotel itself, we believe is on the right way.   See you soon!  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: central location...near Sagrada Familia
review: I had an excellent stay at this hotel. This is really the kind of hotel that I like with just the right features, services and price. The room is large enough with work desk and good space to put both your luggage and hang your shirts and pants. There is a mini fridge that is only stocked with free water on arrival, and then it is up to you to fill it with whatever suits you. This is really the perfect setup for me. There is a supermercat just across the street with necessities.  Bed and pillows are very comfortable. The bathroom had both a tub with shower and a separate shower. I only used the separate walk-in shower. Hot water and great water pressure. Good space to put your bathroom products. However, I would have preferred liquid soap. Wifi worked great and is free, but you…

title: Great Hotel! Great Location...Great Stay
review: We have just returned from a weeks long stay at Hotel Ayres Caspe. (May 1st-8th) and could not have been more happy We had a great room on the top floor looking out onto the street.  The staff was amazing and we were checked in within a few minutes. Staff in the restaurant and bar area were also great and efficient. Feel free to pick up a bottle of wine and ask them to open it for you to take up to your room.  Elevators were quick and we never had to wait for more than a moment.  Breakfast was included for us and they had a nice variety of all types of foods. They provide free bottled water in the room everyday which is a nice touch. They have peaceful, outdoor seating where you can enjoy an afternoon cocktail sitting streetside.  The location is great and not far from many…

title: Everything
review: Dear Damon,   Any word is enough to thank your kindness and precision in your comments and feedback.   Thank you very much for taking a moment to share your experience at Ayre Hotel with Tripadvisor Community, being your host it has been a pleasure for us, and I hope we can do it many times.  See you soon!  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Good location. Helpful staff.
review: Stayed for 2 nights and paid to include breakfast with booking (would definitely reccomend as breakfast was brilliant, hot and cold food loads of choice and delicious). Rooms were spacious and clean, staff were friendly. Location was great, 10-15min stroll into the centre, a couple of great restaurants round the corner - in particular Asador Barcelona / Vic Brasseria

title: Good value!
review: Dear Oliver  We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: No words to explain
review: We stayed for 4 nights from Easter Sunday and had a deal including a bottle and chocolates. When we arrived there was a bottle of Cava on ice and two chocolate brownie desserts which made a great start to the holiday. We were only a short walk from Sagrada Familia and there were bars and restaurants close by including Mayura a favourite Indian restaurant of ours. The reception staff at the hotel were extremely helpful and made good suggestions for places to visit. One kind gentlemen even walked us to a bar he recommended as we couldn't find it from his directions. The double room was large with plenty of storage space. The bathroom had a bath and separate shower. There was a large mirror which didn't steam up, a magnifying mirror, a hairdryer and shaver points. As with many…

title: Great Location and Hotel.
review: It was an excellent decision to stay at the Ayre Caspe in the Barcelona City Centre we couldn't have picked a better hotel. Walking distance to The Familia Sagrada, the Arch De Triomph and old town, as well as the Square. I loved this hotel, the rooms were clean and spacious (but the beds were a bit hard). The hotel looks modern and everything looks brand new. The staff were extremely friendly, they went out of their way to help with our needs. The restaurant attached to it has very good food.

title: If you are looking for a room without any light this is it!
review: Dear Charlene,   Thank you very much for your kind comments, having chosen us was an honor for us.   I hope that on your next stay everything will be as good as it was in this last visit, and allow me to remind you that in case you need it, we have "toppers" to make the beds more cushioned.  Greetings from Barcelona  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Modern, clean and with big room
review: Room clean Room without view Room without sunlight at all (inside view) Room with no drink in the bar (but they charge your card just in case you...still?!!) Room without any modern (hi tech) equipment...no iPhone dock for example Room with a noisy air conditioning fan Room without isolation to better hear who is doing what in the corridor Location maybe is good... Not a 4* from my personal experience!

title: Good stay and helpful staff
review: Dear Guillaume,   I would like to thank you for your visit during your pass in Barcelona. I am grieve to know that you were not as comfortable as you woult expect in the room that was assigned to you, specially because our staff is always available to change room if not it's not the liking of the guest, whatever the reason.  I would like to extend your explanation about the credit card, commenting that can quietly through the simple gesture of offering it to us, to have access to our services such as cafeteria, extra breakfast, laundry, phone calls.   I hope you can trust on ours 4 stars Ayre Hoteles we have on each hotel and visit us again, with the possibility of surprise you.  Greetings from BCN  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hoteles

title: Lovely hotel brilliant stay
review: I would really recommend this hotel!  The hotel location is very good, just in the middle between sagrada family and the city center, hence you can easily move by foot to reach the main attractiveness. The room are very modern and very nice! The bathroom has both the bath and the shower!  The breakfast is vary from sweet to salt stuff and of good quality.  Really recommended

title: Great location, friendly staff, cute room!
review: Just 15 minutes walk from Arc de Triumph. Super friendly staff speaking many languages. Cheap for what you get. Nice lobby. Cozy and modern room, comfy bed and pillows. Super clean. quite big bathroom, free water. I just loved the place. But number one thing about it is location. Did not have breakfast there as around the hotel there are so many places where locals go for coffee with fresh chocolate napolitanas and croissants. Farmacy near, supermarket near. 5 euros by taxi from Plaza Catalunya if you are tired or lazy to walk. The only thing to improve - thin walls. Otherwise, just excellent.

title: A great base to tour Barcelona
review: Dear Mariposarina,   thank you very much for your kind comments. Being our guest at Ayre Hotel Caspe having the number of hotels in Barcelona to choose from, make us so proud. To know the opinion of each guest is a gift to us, and gives us the opportunity to identify their feelings and to surprise on your next visit. Thanks for your advice, we value positively. Hope to see you again for Barcelona, and certainly by the Ayre Caspe.   Best Regards,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: very nice and affordable hotel
review: Arrived at El Prat and purchased the Airport bus return ticket and Metro passes before leaving the airport.  Look up costs on line and can be purchased beforehand if you wish but was easy at the airport during the day. Bus was easy to find to take the 15 minute trip into Barcelona which was 25 minutes on the return could have been longer had we been caught in the traffic accident we saw the previous night on the very same route near the Arena shopping centre.  Took the T2 bus to the end of line to the square where there are plenty of taxi ranks.  BE WARNED ask the fare first to your destination.  As we had cases we didn't want to walk as we were tired from the early start but it was a distance we walked many times after 15 minutes approx to the hotel from the square where the…

title: Good base to explore Barcelona
review: Dear Kenth,  We are pleased with your visit, we thank you visited Barcelona and our hotel Ayre Caspe.   Thanks for your tips for the rest of the Tripadvisor community, ¡they are very useful!   Your hotel comments cheered us as it gives many details of interest to other users of Tripadvisor, and we are proud that our team has accomplished our mission: to share happy moments.   Hope you feel better from your throat, for my part have already sent the technician to adjust the air conditioning.  I hope your next stay even more enjoyable, and it soon, we will be waiting.  Greetings from BCN,  E. Garcia - Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great place to stay for a city break
review: Great place to stay when exploring this beautiful city. I had a very good deal and stayed for two nights. Check in was quick, front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. The room and bathroom were clean and surprisingly spacious. Bed was comfortable and everything was working just fine. The only downside was that my room had a view to the atrium and consequently I had to keep the curtains closed as otherwise everybody would have been able to look into my room. I recommend  to get a room with a view to the Caspe Street. Went to breakfast once, buffet was Ok but a little expensive (there are other options for breakfast available though).  Wifi is free and worked perfectly fine, you should get a ticket with a password for every device you're planning to use. It's a little far…

title: fabulous palce to stay
review: This is a beautiful hotel.  The rooms are spacious, the bed enormous and comfy.  The bathroom has a walk in shower and a bath - great for relaxing after a long day sight seeing.  We got a great deal so it was amazing value for money. Breakfast wasn't included in the price, but that didn't matter as there are many places nearby where you can eat.  We just bought fruit at the supermarket opposite the hotel - their satsumas are delicious.  The location is very good, just 10-15 minutes walk to the Placa Catalunya where the airport and city tour buses depart from.  There are many restaurants and bars nearby.  We recommend the Vic Braderia for Catalan cuisine.  It is on Carrer de Sicilia, just round the corner from the hotel.  Also on this street is the Jaizkiber - they don't speak…

title: Good for short stay, not so good for long stay
review: Dear Guest,   We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Nice hotel at good location
review: I stayed here for a week with my family, as I had a business meeting at the hotel. I can only say the hotel was ok. A week is too long to stay there in my opinion. 2 nights maximum is what I would suggest.  They provided us with a baby bed for free. It was the nicest baby bed any hotel has ever provided us with.   Half the staff seems to not want to be there. The other half are happy and seem to enjoy their jobs (one shining example is Sandra, who works the bar/restaurant).   Breakfast was overpriced for what it was. We've had better quality food for less at other hotels (but I cannot compare to other Spanish hotels). The same food was presented each day for breakfast, so it got really old really fast. It was part of the room fee, so we decided to just eat there each day.  The…

title: Friendly clean hotel
review: Dear Katja  First of all, i would like to thank you the time you dedicate to us writing this review, specially coming from a frequent traveller and tripadvisor critic.  Every single comment all our guests make, are treated with the maximum care an seriousness it deserves, and yours is not the exception.   Some things make us so happy to read, like the cot was memorable, and our teams seems proud to work on Ayre Hoteles, but believe me, this is the general sensation, Ayre Hoteles goal is to share happy moments, not only on behalf on the guest, but also between us, so please excuse us if you didn't percieved this feeling.  Regarding breakfast, I'll transfer your inquietude to our chef maitre in order to review the standards of the buffet. Allow me to explain we usually move around fresh fruit, fresh orange juice, nespresso coffee, homeland products, but i guarantee everyday our kitchen staff prepares something different to surprise our guests.  I hope and desire you can give us another chance, not only in Ayre Hotel Caspe, but also in other points and hotels around Spain, stay tuned on our social networks to discover them.  Thank you once more for visiting Ayre Hoteles, it's been our pleasure to be your hosts.  Greetings from Barcelona,  E. Garcia Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Nice hotel
review: Nice hotel at a good location in Barcelona. It's close to the Segrada familia and Arc de Triomf. It's more or less a trendy hotel but don't expect a design hotel. Rooms are nice, clean and spacious. Als a not to expensive parking garage underneath the hotel. For a late night cocktail you can go to the bar around the corner (la higuera). If you are looking for a nice hotel in Barcelona, you can't go wrong with this one.

title: Modern hotel in quiet area
review: We stayed for a week over Christmas and found the hotel on the whole very good. The room was clean with plenty of wardrobe space and a good sized fridge for keeping drinks cool. In the bathroom there was a bath and separate shower. TV. Good lighting. Bed quite firm. There were a few minor problems like an irritating unknown hum (although not from the lights - we did report it), the windows don't open and the shower area could do with re-grouting.   However on the plus side the staff were friendly and polite. The breakfast was good for 12 Euros. It was included in our package. The scrambled eggs cooked to order and fresh fruit selection were excellent. The breakfast staff were always very welcoming and helpful.  We had read previous reviews and booked a room near the lift with a…

title: Clean and quiet hotel
review: Dear Diane  We are so glad to have had you as our guests, it’s been our pleasure. We thank you choosing us to spend your days in this lovely city! And I’d like to express my gratefulness for completing our satisfaction survey. Each comment and review help us to improve and offer to our clients a better service day by day.  Windows are openable only in a small portion, it's made on purpose by law requirements. Thank you so much for your advice regarding bathroom, we're working on that ASAP.  I feel sorry if restaurantes in the neighborhood were not as you might expected. We have (besides our own restaurante) many of them close to us with a very good quality of meal, maybe our front desk staff could recommended one. I bet for the next visit :)  Don’t hesitate in contacting us for any further comment or question, please.  Hope to see you again soon!!!  Warmest regards,  E. Garcia Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com

title: Wonderful location and friendly, helpful staff
review: Nice hotel, not far from Les Rambles (a 20-minute walk), really quiet during the night. There are 6-7 floors and the hotel is equipped with both lifts and stairs. We stayed in a double room with separate beds: there is enough space for two people and in the bathroom there were both the bath and the shower. Breakfast wasn't included and it cost around 16€, but I can't say how it is because we didn't try it (there is also a gym, and I guess it's free to join). There is free wi-fi connection in each room but it's often really slow (we noticed that only in the early morning it worked fine). Recommendable if you don't mind having a little walk to reach the main streets and if you want a quiet hotel.

title: In the future I will choose my hotel closer to the center.
review: Dear Maverick  Thank you so much for visiting us during your stay in this lovely city, Barcelona.  Your comments are so helpful to keep on our workline. We apologize if wi-fi was not as you might expected, and allow me to share with you that we recently had an intervention from the company which manages it to offer a better service, so I hope in your next visit you can enjoy it.  Greetings from Barcelona,  E. Garcia Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com

title: 10 minutes walk from town centre 10 minutes walk from beach
review: We stayed 5 nights in this lovely little hotel. It's close to the metro and the staff is very friendly and helpful. The hotel is clean and spacious and quiet. The buffet breakfast for 12 euros is way overpriced for what you get. Easy walking distance to the old town and the Mediterranean coast. You can take the metro to all of the sights as well as to and from the airport.

title: Very slow wifi for Business Trip
review: Stayed 5 nights with spouse on business visit. They have a very good reception team, friendly and helpful. The double rooms are plays q  quite spacious and modern, lighting level in the room was terrific for older people. The wide desk, 2 chairs with space for two people was appreciated. Housekeeping was also very good. The mirror in the bathroom as a heater is quite interesting. The breakfast was average, but meets our expectations for the class of hotel. Underground carparking was tight, again no worst than similar hotels in Spain. Wifi was very, very, and very slow, down to 10kbps most of the time. One of my email with a 3 Meg attachment took 10 minutes to send. I would give this hotel an excellent score if the wifi speed was at a more reasonable speed. Wifi speed was…

title: Good location but not helpful for tourist information
review: Dear guest,   Thank you so much for being here with your spouse for business purposes, we've been pleased guesting you and we hope doing it again in the future.  Thank you as well for sharing your experience with all Tripadvisor community, it's very helpful for us to know your sensations and opinion.  Regarding the lights, allow me to explain we have many points of light in the room, between foot lamps, desk lamps, bed lamps, roof lights and bathroom, and each of them can be regulated as liked, but i'm sure we will offer you the best accomodation in your next visit :)  Regarding wi-fi, we have a 2mbps download speed wireless connection, i'm surprised of what you expose and we will inform this to the company who provides adsl and wi-fi network to solve it. Thank you for your advise. We work so hard to mantain wi-fi free of charge and good.   Please don't hesitate in contacting us for further info, i'm at your disposal.  E. Garcia Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com

title: A decent hotel with excelent location
review: Good location and overall a nice, clean hotel, but certainly seems more oriented towards business travelers. You would think everyone at the desk would be familiar with how to get tickets for major sites such as Casa Mila, Park Guell, etc. but our group of friends each received different information depending on who we talked to. The bar at the hotel closed promptly at 11:00 every night so we couldn’t meet there for drinks after dinner to share our experiences from the day.

title: Average quality, convenient located and reasonable price
review: Dear McNallyB   We appreciate so much your visit and your interest in approaching the reception to inquire about the attractions of the city, especially if you come in groups, but we regret you perceive a disunion in the information received.  In general, we usually go to the same reservation system when giving an indication, but there are also many places that do not allow the sale of tickets in hotels, and that is where perhaps deprives the experience each of us had to recommend the best available . We note your suggestion and we'll put into practice, thank you so much.  So too, I would like to comment that the bar closes at 23 pm daily and we regret that no options in the hotel, it's a chain politic.  Don't hesitate in contacting us for further information.  E. Garcia Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com

title: Good Staff, Room Size/Quality Not the Best
review: I've appreciated the room's facilities in general. It is also a clean hotel.  As  a negative I can mention the weak wifi we had in some moments.  But this hotel offers an excellent price-quality ratio in general

title: Great find off the beaten track
review: What a great place to stay! Reception staff friendly and helpful on check in. Room spacious and clean. Nice touch of free still and sparkling water. Bathroom provides bath and a separate shower and all toiletries. Mattress was very hard but we got used to it on the 2nd night and had a good nights sleep (Great blackout curtains too) Good wifi connection. Near enough to metro and if you fancy walking to centre takes approx 15-20 minutes along lovely quiet streets- even safe enough walking back late at night.  Overall a very pleasant stay and will return on our next trip to Barcelona

title: What a pleasant stay at this hotel
review: Dear Mibial, I'd like to thank every single word you dedicate to us.  ¡It's lovely to see precisely what we want to put into our guests mind!   Hope to see you again so soon, ¡we'll be pleased to guest you once and miles more!  Greetings from BCN  E. Garcia Community Manager Ayre Hotel Caspe socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com

title: Very Good Hotel - somewhat off the beaten path
review: We arrived for our city break and are greeted by smiling helpful staff. We had booked car parking which was an underground car park. Our bigish car struggled  little bit on some of the corners and parking was,a little tight, never mind we had secure parking and that was,what we had asked for. The bedroom was,spacious and really bright and clean. Air conditioning meant we could decide if we wanted the room warm or cool and it was a responsive system. The ladies who tidied our room were very nice and made sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed. We had a nice big bathroom with a full size bath and a,walk in shower.  The hotel is pretty central, we could walk to the Marina,and La Rambla. We would definitely stay at this hotel again.

title: Stay in Hotel Caspe for 7 nights in October 2014
review: Dear Lindsey  Thank you so much for such those lovely words and value, we're so pleased to see our work is well recieved by our guests. Please accept our apologies if the parking is not big enough to maneuver well a big car, but as you mentioned, it's safe and always closed to offer the posibility to visit the city without the need of the car.  Please don't hesitate in contact us for anything you might need or consider, and don't forget to follow us on our social networks for news :)  Yours,   E. Garcia Community Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com

title: short break
review: Very good hotel.  Somewhat off the beaten path - but several Metro stops within easy walking distance.  Clean comfortable rooms.  Good beds, Helpful desk staff.  Several good restaurants (frequented primarily by locals) within walking distance.  The only problem I experienced was that the TV volume was limited so that I was unable to hear the BBC.  - Easily solved on the fast free internet, by finding the code to.disable volume limiting on LG TV's.

title: Perfect For Barcelona City Trips
review: It has been an excellent decision to stay at the Ayre Caspe in the Barcelona City Centre. Due to the close connection to the local Subway Train station it was just a 5-10min walk to the next subway entry. The Hotel itsself is clean and has a normal up to high level standard. The personal at the reception we had contact with was polite and always available when we had any requests. The only point we were not excited about was the price for breakfast.12EUR per Person was a bit too much so we decided to check by ourself any options which we found easily at the close Bakery shops. Overall, an excellent stay and experience of Barcelona, besides the rainy weather but that is not any fault by the hotel of course.. ;)

title: Wonderful Experience
review: Dear Sascha  I feel so grateful reading this review. Your perception of our structure and staff is just what we desire to put in the top of our strengths.  ¡Thank you for sharing your experience with all Tripadvisor community!  Regarding breakfast, we understand you prefer to check on the proximity bakeries, they are lovely. But allow me to explain that our breakfast is something special: fresh fruit, natural squeezed orange juice, different hams and cheese, local dishes, different kind of bread, sweets, vegetables, and the possibility to order hot dishes made in the same moment, specially for you.  I hope in your next visit you give us the chance to prove it. Feel free to contact us for anything you might consider at socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com.  Greetings from Barcelona  E. Garcia Community Manager Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: great hotel
review: My wife and I stayed there in mid September to celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary, and we couldn't have picked a better hotel. The rooms were clean and spacious (for a European Hotel). Also the whole hotel looks renovated and everything looks brand new. The staff were extremely friendly, they went out of their way to make our stay pleasant. They even offered us a bottle of Champagne on our anniversary, a very thoughtful gesture from the staff.  The hotel is not in the center of the city where all the commotion and traffic is, which is what we wanted, it's a 20 - 30 minutes walk to the beach and the big attractions.

title: Great Hotel. Great location, reasonably priced and very clean
review: Dear Nick  We're so glad you enjoyed your stay in the hotel, and I'd like to thank you chose us for such a special ocasion.  Thank you for your review, hope you can visit us again in the future, not only in Barcelona, but in other points in Spain.   Please stay in touch with us for anything you might consider at socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com  Greetings,  E. Garcia Social Media Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Nice hotel , convinient location
review: Just got back from spending 3 nights at this lovely city.the hotel was lovely the moment we stepped into it, it was very clean and the staff were very helpful and friendly from the moment we checked in. The hotel itself is set  in a good location to go exploring all the local sites. Beach 15 mins away la rambla 15 mins sagrada familia is also 15 mins away, tip if you want to see this go early gets really really busy with bus tours. As a whole hotel fantastic Barcelona beautiful would love to go back.

title: Nice clean hotel
review: We stayed at the hotel for 4 nights; the hotel was very clean the staff was friendly. The WIFI worked well but you had to enter the password every day. It was very hard to get the temperature right in the room, the thermostat didn't had any numbers on it to indicate the temperature. The location is good. Overall a good stay.

title: Fantastic stay at this hotel
review: Dear Guest  ¡Thank you so much for your review!  We always want every guest has an unique experience...full of happiness and joy. Please excuse us if some things were not as you might expected, as A/C and Wi-Fi.  The system to control air conditioned is quite simple, but it's true does not have the exact temperature you have in the room, but only the regulation to put more heat or cool.  Wi-Fi works with different IP's, so while you are connected you have yours, but when y are out of the hotel it gets free to limit the users and offer a better connection.  Please don't hesitate in contacting us for anything you might consider at socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com or our social networks for news.  ¡See you soon!  E. Garcia - Social Media Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Ideal
review: From checking in to checking out everything at this hotel made you feel welcome and comfortable.  The desk, restaurant and cleaning staff were all extremely nice and pleasant. We had our bags taken to our room, which was ultra clean and modern.  Free bottled water in fridge and our request for an iron was answered immediately.  We had the breakfast buffet 4 out of 5 days which was very much worth €11, with high quality cold meats and pastries and hot food available on request and even Cava!   The only negative was the WiFi which was slow and rarely connected to my iPhone but it was free and we didn't spend much time in the hotel we had a city to the explore.  I strongly recommended this hotel, it was that expensive but the service and quality made it feel so much more!

title: I'll be back
review: Dear Ryan  This is such a lovely review. I'm speechless reading your experience and how you felt with us. Thank you so much.  Even if you're completely right, you have a city to explore...it's not fare for you to not to enjoy every single service of the hotel, so we provide your comment to our wi-fi provider to work on it.  Allow me to send my very best regards and to put myself on your hands to do anything you might consider, please write us at socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com to stay connected to us. And don't forget to follow us on our social networks!  Greetings,  E. Garcia - Social Media Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Lovely staff and very clean hotel
review: We returned from Barcelona yesterday, having spent 5 nights at the Ayre Hotel, Caspe. This is a great hotel, nice and quiet and only a 15-20 minute walk from Playa Catalunya. Staff were polite and friendly and the rooms were cleaned every day. Wi-Fi worked no problem, there's also a mini fridge in the room.  I would definitely recommend this hotel, it's a great base for exploring the lovely city of Barcelona.  If you're going to do the bus tour (best way to see the city) - it's worth considering a two day pass as there is too much to see and do in just one day!

title: Great stay
review: We chose the hotel for it's big new roooms.This was a mother-daughter trip & we arranged a pick up to & from the airport through the hotel. The service was extremely professional. Communication wth Monique at the hotel was very good & I was pleased with the efficiency.   The reception staff are very helpful & the housekeeping do an excellent job with the rooms, which were big, new & clean. However we found the pillows to be too thin & inadequate.   Although this hotel is a 10 minute walk to the nearest main attraction, we were pleased we chose to stay in a quieter area. We walked to all of the attractions, except for Park Guell- we took the bus 24 from Placa Cantalunya. We also booked the tour for Sagrada Familia which we found very good.  We did not have breafast at the hotel.…

title: Great contemporary hotel!
review: Dear guest  We're impressed with your review!!! Thank you so much, it's lovely to see our teams fulfill our guest's expectations. Monique is such a great Professional and she is our "vibe manager", to satisfy any request we recieve, as well as being our Front Desk Manager.  Our teams are well trained to give any information, provide assistance in getting tickets, book restaurantes and transports, as many other things.  Don't hesitate in asking what you have in mind, and leave it on our hands!!!  Hope you can enjoy Ayre Hotels once and miles more, we're looking forward to have news from you.  Greetings from BCN :)  E. Garcia - Social Media Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great place
review: This hotel is located in a peaceful area, just 5 minutes from Arch De Triump and the tube station. The hotel is beautifully decorated with a contemporary theme. It has wonderful entrance lounge and bar. The rooms are a good size and very clean. The hotel staff were very helpful and his hotel is ideal for a short city break. We really enjoyed our stay here.

title: Awesome
review: Dear Mehwish  Thank you for choosing us to spend some days in this lovely city!!! A city break is one of the main reasons our guests come to visit us. Thank you for sharing your experiencie among Tripadvisor community and to give them this suggestion!  Hope to see you again soon, to continue enjoying Spain!!!  Greetings from Barcelona!  E. Garcia - Social Media Manager - Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great Barcelona base
review: As recent reviewers have said, this has everything you need for a city break catering for both vacationers and business guests. The rooms are a good size, as is the bathroom with a separate shower as well as a bath. We paid extra for the breakfast - it is buffet style with a wide selection of food and drink (including cava!) plus you can also order a selection of freshly cooked dishes, the poached eggs were done to perfection. The hotel staff are all friendly and helpful and ready to offer advice on the city's attractions.

title: Great location and room!
review: Very comfortable room with a great location. There are nicely priced bars and coffee shops around and within walking distance to most places you want to see in Barcelona or even better, to the metro stop. I felt very safe here and welcomed. Would definitely stay again, especially with the free Wi-fi and the quiet rooms.

title: Central hotel for a good value
review: Dear Sofia!  Thank you so much for visiting us, and to take a moment to share your Ayre Experience with Tripadvisor!  Did you know we offer a very good Menu in our Bar??? Next time you can taste it, for sure!!!  Hope to see you again soon!  Greetings From BCN!

title: Great place for the money!
review: Stayed here for a few days in August for a business trip. The staff at the front desk are very helpful and friendly. The rooms are clean and modern. You aren't too far from a few sights .. Las Ramblas, Sagrada Famillia, La Monumental, Hospital de Sant Pau. Tons of restaurants near by as well. Definitely will stay here again.

title: Day 2 of 11 night at Ayre caspe
review: Dear VancouverAzzurri,  Thank you so much for your kind words and to share your Ayre Experience with all Tripadvisor community, specially if you came to Barcelona for Business, so you might be used to visit Hotels.  I hope you can visit us once and miles more to continue your Barcelona experience! Don't hesitate in contacting us trough our social networks to see our news, or at socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com for further information.  Greetings from BCN!!!

title: Clean, Simple & Quiet
review: We stayed at the Ayre Hotel Caspe for two nights.  When we checked in we were greeted by very friendly staff.  The bedrooms and bathrooms are a decent size.  The hotel is about 45 mins away from the airport - on public transportation.  La Sagrada Familia is within walking distance (about 15 mins).  The nearest metro station is about 5 mins away.  The metro makes almost all of the city very accessible.  Check out is at 12 pm, which is rare in most hotels.. a big plus.  We are checking out tomorrow and the hotel will hold on to our bags so that we can take advantage of our last day.

title: Would definitely return
review: I stayed at this hotel for 4 nights when visiting the city recently and it was a pleasure.  The reception stay we're very friendly and helpful making check in and out very easy as well as helping to book excursions and recommend restaurants.  The hotel was very clean and comfortable as  was the room.  The hotel offers 2 different breakfasts. The express menu in the bar at 4€ and the continental breakfast in the restaurant at 12€. I would recommend both.  The hotel is a 1.4km walk from passeig de Garcia  but is only a short walk to arc de triomphe an tetuan metro stations.  Would definitely stay here again. Good price and great experience.

title: Perfect!
review: Dear LJ  Thank you so much for the time you dedicate us sharing your Ayre Experience with the Tripadvisor community! We were glad to recieve you and we will once more at your return!!!  Hope to see you again soon!  Greetings,

title: Would recommend for those who would prefer to be a little away from the chaos
review: We picked this because my wife needed disabled facilities, so we had a room with a large walk-in shower. The room was spotless, the only downside was a very firm mattress! The breakfast selection was excellent. The location was ideal for everything we wanted to see and do - even pushing a wheelchair, it was only a 20-minute walk to the beach, and we didn't have to walk more than 30 minutes to see all the attractions we wanted. The staff were very helpful and friendly. On our last day, we had an evening flight, and we were allowed to use the gym shower facilities to shower and change before our flight home. Would definitely stay there again!

title: Everything works, a good choice
review: It's been our pleasure to guest you!   Trusting us in the conditions you were, and finally saying "perfect" it's a real honor to us to make part of the Ayre Family. We try always to satisfy every single request and treat it as if it were for ourselves.  The hardness of the matrasses may be caused by their age...becasue are brand new!!! :)  We're really looking forward in guesting you once and miles more, we'll be happy to recieve you, don't hesitate in contacting us at socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com for any request.  Greetings from BCN :)

title: Very Good Experience!
review: Ayre Hotel Caspe was a great hotel, located within walking distance to the Arc de Triomphe and Sagrada Familia. There is a metro station located at the Arc de Triomphe. You can also walk to the beach and Plaza Catalunya if you are up for the 20 mintute walk. The staff were very helpful with giving directions to the sites and areas. The rooms are very comfortable and modern. There are grocery stores around the corner. I didn't have an issue with the wifi. After going to La Rambla I am glad I chose to stay a bit further away from that area because it would have been too noisy and crowded/stressful. It was nice to come home to some peace and quiet. I felt really safe in the neighbourhood as well. Would recommend!

title: Great Hotel!
review: Awesome hotel! Rooms were large and clean. It was a 5 minute walk from the arc triomphe station. Nice neighborhood. Not too close to the hustle and bustle but not too far from main attractions. Placa Catalunya was only a couple of stops away. As was the Sagrada Familia. Staff was friendly and helpful. Will stay again when in Barcelona!

title: Very good!
review: Thank you David for your 5 stars and your kind words!!! Hope to keep your word and return to Ayre Hoteles in your next stop in Spain!!! We'll be waiting for you with open arms.   Please contact us at socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com for anything you might consider!  Thank you again for sharing your Ayre Experience with all Tripadvisor community!  Greetings from BCN ;)

title: Modern Barcelona Hotel
review: Stayed in this hotel during our first visit in Barcelona in July and thoroughly enjoyed it!  The hotel was great, modern and tastefully decorated. The hotel was very clean as was the bedroom which was serviced everyday with fresh towels and toiletries. The bedroom was large with a comfortable double bed, large desk area with chair and sofa. The bathroom was of favourable size with both an individual shower and separate bath.  We enjoyed an express breakfast on our first morning for 4€ which included sandwich, coffee and orange juice. On our second and third morning we opted for the buffet breakfast which had a wealth of continental options as well as hot items (sausages, bacon, omelettes, etc) for no extra cost - 12€ per person.  Only one down side.. We did understand that the…

title: Excellent value
review: Dear guest, thank you so much for such a lovely review!  We're so glad you enjoyed your stay, and we thank you shared it with all Tripadvisor community!  Ayre Hoteles likes to keep our guests always fit!!! So the distance to Catalunya Square is made on purpose :)  Please stay tuned on our social networks for news, and please contact me for anything you might consider at socialmedia.caspe@ayrehoteles.com.  Greetings from Barcelona!

title: Amazing hotel for an amazing price!
review: Our three night stay at Ayre Hotel Casp was mostly pleasant. The staff was friendly, the location was convenient, and the breakfast was great! We spent most of our days out and about exploring and enjoying the beautiful beaches of Barcelona. When we returned to the hotel each night our room was uncomfortably warm. We had all layers of the shades drawn, and the air on the coolest setting. I'm not sure if it was just a problem with our room or if the European standard of "air conditioning" is different than in the US? Anyways, that didn't ruin our stay and we were happy with all other aspects of the hotel.

title: Would be perfect if the beds were softer
review: This hotel was our base of operations for a week's stay in Barcelona. The location was perfect for us - a nice quiet area not too far from interesting sights, restaurants and shopping. On checking in, we were given a map and a quick overview of nearby attractions and public transportation. Several metro stations are within walking distance, the one we used the most was Tetuan. All the staff members we interacted with were very friendly and professional.    The lobby and other public areas have a very modern look. Our room too was modern-looking and clean. The bathroom had both a bathtub and a separate shower stall, which I liked a lot. Don't have to climb into the tub just to take a shower. If you like a firm bed then this is the hotel for you - for my tastes, they were a little…

title: Amazing city, visited from a brilliant base!
review: Dear Guest, i'd like to express my happiness to read your review! You've been so kind to dedicate such lovely words and all the explanations to the other members of Tripadvisor can appreciate our services. Besides, the comment of bedding is so important! We've changed all the beds in the hotel recently, so it's possible you find it not as soft as you might expect. Allow me to explain that we try to establish a media hardness for the beds. I hope you can live another Ayre Experience around Spain in your next visit!  Greetings,  E. Garcia - SM Ayre Hotel Caspe

title: Great hotel, great location.
review: We stayed at the Hotel Ayre Caspe in Barcelona at the end of June 2014. The hotel is located ten mins pleasant walk from the Arc de Triomph Metro station. First time in Barcelona and with no Spanish between us we wanted to ensure we saw all the great sights in our long weekend break. The hotel was spotless, spacious and had everything we needed: comfy bed, brilliant shower, extra toiletries and wifi.  The main compliment though goes to the friendly and helpful staff. They helped us plan our itinerary, ensuring we hit the best spots, they also directed us every day with the help of a brilliant map and lots of pointing to where we should go and as our flight was evening, post checkout time they let us leave our cases all day and allowed us a room to shower and change in. Great…

title: Good hotel. Pricey though.
review: Well, what else can i add to your wonderful review!!! Nothing but Thank you!!!  Please feel free to connect with us trough our social networks to stay tuned with our fantastic news!!!  Hope to see  you again soon :)

title: hotel to be back
review: The hotel was comfortable and clean. We had two single beds in our room (but pushed together) and it was fine. The bathroom had a bathtub/shower and a separate shower which was nice and convenient. The location wasn't too far from things, we took public transport a few times but walking was reasonable.  The breakfast cost extra but it was well-worth it. We ate at the hotel every day of our visit. They had a huge selection of options and everything tasted wonderful.

title: Great modern hotel in Barcelona
review: I really like this hotel.  It's location in perfect, in/near the heart of the city.  The reservation desk agents are very helpful and friendly.  The morning breakfast is very good.  My room was fine, great bathroom, modern style.  A guest can pay more money for a view of the church.  The church is still under construction. Guests can use a nearby gym, which is actually a very nice health club, for free.  I used it yesterday.  The Internet is free.  Overall, a very decent hotel.

title: Good hotel for the price
review: Dear Mark, first of all i'd like to thank you for choosing Ayre Hoteles for your stay in Barcelona!   Perhaps your review is directed to Ayre Hotel Rosellon, so I will redirect your kind words to them. We're a team!!!  I hope you can enjoy once more this lovely city and maybe try our Sagrada Familia rooms, they're so special!  Hope to see you again soon, greetings!

title: Great stay, the staff were so kind
review: The hotel was in a good location near many restaurants and shops and close to the metro.  The beds were twin sized and not very comfortable but the rooms were a great size for Europe and everything was clean and modern.  The staff was excellent and the breakfast was really good.  It was a good hotel for the price.

title: Great location, great rooms and service, food not so special
review: Dear Megan! Thank you for sharing your Ayre Experience among all Tripadvisor community! We're so pleased to read you comments and value.  Hope to see you again so soon, don't hesitate in visiting our social networks for news!  Greetings,  E. Garcia - SM Ayre Caspe

title: Great hotel in a quiet location
review: My husband and I stayed here in June, it's a lovely hotel but it's really the staff that make it so great. They made a special fuss of us as honeymooners and it was really appreciated. In fact throughout our whole stay they couldn't be more helpful and attentive.  Our room was modern, spacious and spotlessly clean with plenty of facilities. The air con was great and the beds were comfy. The only downside was that the walls were quite thin so we were disturbed a few times during our stay.  The drinks in the bar were great, especially the mojitos and the service was excellent too.  We had a few bar meals during our stay and opted to have breakfast on a couple of the mornings. The food was all really impressive, really tasty and plenty of choice for breakfast.  I would definitely…

title: Great Hotel
review: This is a very nice, newer modern hotel. It is very clean and the staff was very nice and most spoke english. It is a little way from the city center but only about a 20 minute walk and well worth it for how nice it is. Also close to the Sagrada de Familia at about a 10 minute walk. We did room service one night and the food was excellent.

title: Comfortable Stay and Great Staff!
review: Dear Bryan! Thank you so much for visiting us and sharing your Ayre Experience!!! It's been an honor to guest you and to receive such lovely word from you.  Hope we see you again soon to continue exploring this amazing country!   Best Regards,

title: Excellent Value and Location
review: My mom and I stayed here for 2 nights in mid-May, after spending 10 days in Italy. Good size rooms for 2 people and comfortable beds - bathrooms were a nice change too from the old and small bathrooms we had been using in Italy! The staff was fantastic, especially the bartender. Close walk to La Sagrada Familia, and not too far from Las Ramblas/The Gothic Quarter either. Great restaurant for tapas called Dune right around the corner as well. Would definitely stay here again!

title: Comfortable stay
review: Dear Shannon, I wish to express my gratitude for writing this review and giving us this wonderful score.   I hope we can guest you one more time to reinforce our values ​​and goals.   Thank you for having granted the honor of guest you!  Greetings from BCN :)

title: Pleasantly surprised
review: I just spent hotel days at the Ayre, and I can tell you it's one of the best hotel decisions I've made in my 40 years of traveling. It's a well-appointed little hotel with the usual small-for-Americans size rooms, but everything in mine was working, clean, and stylish (for its price level). TIP: The lights won't work until you insert your room key into the box by the front door -- if you don't know that you can find yourself bewildered as soon as you enter the room for the first time.  The hotel is just off the main streets, near the Tetuan Metro station. With a Barcelona Pass, you can easily access most of the major attractions in a hop, skip, and a jump from there.   The hotel is surrounded by (my guess) a score of cafes, bakeries, bars, and grocery shops within a block each…

title: first time in Barcelona
review: This was our first trip to Barcelona and were looking forward to it.  Holy cow were we pleasantly surprised when we walked into the reception are of the Ayre Hotel Caspe.  It was like walking into heaven.  The young men and women behind the counter were courteous and helpful, super friendly and made us feel welcome with their first smiles.  Every morning heading to breakfast, each late night dragging in from a night on the "rambla", we were always made to feel welcome and at home.  Definitely a first rate hotel and would recommend it to everyone.  curious fact:  on the hotel side of the street the numbers were 100 - 199 on the opposite side they were in the 140's.  helpful hint.  dont look at the opposite side of the street when walking from Catalunya Plaza.

title: The Best Part Of Day
review: Dear Rex...what can i say... I'm so proud to read this kind of reviews, reflects all we want to show: our services, our hotel, but specially our human resources. The smile is part of us, we'll always try to make you feel as home, and "holy cow" we did it!!! :)  Hope to see you again so soon!!!  Greetings from the sunny Barcelona :)

title: Position perfect
review: My wife and I are celebrating our Wedding anniversary and we were satisfied and overwhelmingly enjoyed our 2 nights stay, the location is perfect, close to Sagrada Familia and Plaza Catalunya, very kind staff, special mention to Monique, their Chief & Steban and the skinny Guy who helped me during our arrival on that Sunday afternoon, our room is so lovely with nice present. I would highly recommend this hotel to everybody who will visit Barcelona. Keep up the good works guy and Thank you, you really made the best part of our day..!

title: Meets all expectations
review: Dear Jun, I'm so happy to be part of your day, and specially be the best of it! I'm very proud of being part of Ayre Hoteles, where surprising a guest it's part of our goal, and i see we did it :)  Hope i could see you again soon, we'll be so happy to guest you once more, maybe with more surprises!!!  Greetings from the sunny Barcelona and happy anniversary once more :)

title: I will not recommend this Hotel. It's hell.
review: Ideal location half way between the Sagradia and the Arc, in the business district. Spacious and very well appointed rooms coupled with crisp and efficient service + the personal and helpful touch made our 4 night stay very enjoyable.

title: Location excellent
review: We have stayed here Half a dozen times over the years. Great location to walk out and see the city from. Slightly away from the various tourist districts. Very modern and clean a proper 4 star hotel. Very good local tapas and breakfast bars nearby. Will stay again.

title: Very modern, clean, spacious hotel
review: Dear Barney, I'm speechless!!! Thank you for visiting us once more! Trusting us, confirms that both facilities and service we provide is Quality. Hope to see you again once and hundreds more! It's a pleasure to guest you. Greetings!

title: Very good hotel, great location
review: We spent 7 nights at Ayre Hotel Caspe in April and we have very good impressions overall. Our room was very spacious and clean (I particularly liked the fact that our bathroom was very spacious and had both a shower and tub), the hotel is modern and tidy with spacious common areas, located in a very quiet and safe area of the city (Eixample), the staff is very friendly and helpful, very fast wi-fi connection, and excellent value for money! Be aware that location is not the best you can get. It is -indeed- close to 2 metro stations (Tetuan and Arc de Triomph), but it is in a residential area, so be prepared to walk a lot if you really want to explore the city and especially the old roman city and Barry Gotic area. Not a big problem in my opinion though. The matresses in the beds…

title: Roomy, very clean, and modern
review: Absolutely delightful words Maikol!!! :)  Thank you so much for your review, I feel so happy to fulfill your expectations!   Regarding matrasses, we've changed them a couple of weeks ago, so it's possible they're not as soft as you wish, but i bet when you return to us, they'll be great!!!  Greetings!

title: Hotel at MWC event
review: We spent 3 nights (Fri-Mon) at the Ayre Hotel Caspe on April 2014. The hotel is very well located (10 min walk to the Sagrada Familia and Placa de Catalunya, 3 min walk to Tetuan metro station), with plenty of bars (where one can have a coffee or a "bocadillo") nearby. Staff is friendly and helpful (we were able to check in and get the room at 9:30 am!), common areas are spacious, rooms and bathrooms are big and clean. I had a room on the second floor on the street side and it was not noisy at all. I cannot evaluate gastronomy and sport/wellness offer since I didn't try them.

title: Great value, good location, would recommend
review: Stayed here for one night after a 7 night cruise and was pleasantly surprised.   We arrived too early to check in but the reception staff were very friendly and offered to store out luggage. Also gave us a map and some tips on where to go. Sagrada Familia was just around the corner (approx 5-10 mins) and Las Ramblas was about 20-25 minutes walk.   After a day exploring the beautiful city of Barcelona, we went back to the hotel for a lovely hot bath and a very comfortable nights sleep. The room itself was spacious and clean. Breakfast the next morning was lovely and offered a great selection.   I think we paid around £70 for the night which was amazing value. For that sort of price in such a good location, you tend to lower your expectations but this hotel far exceeded mine.…

title: Good value
review: Dear! We're so glad to know we've been as you expected! Thank you for your kind review :)  Cheers from Barcelona!

title: Price!
review: My wife and I stayed at this hotel while travelling through Spain. The hotel was in a nice area and the staff were friendly. The room was slightly bigger than some of the other rooms we stayed in while in Europe. Our bathroom was also spacious with a separate tub and shower. Overall, both the room and hotel were clean and it was a good value. I would recommend trying to get a room with a view of the outside rather than the inside hallway.

title: A nice stay
review: Dear Aaron, thank you so much for the time you dedicate us leaving your experience.   We're glad we've been part of your Spanish trip! Thank you for your comments, we hope to see you again soon to try other rooms we have :)  Greetings from BCN :)

title: Great value- good choice for the price
review: I booked this hotel on a business trip as I needed to go to el Vallés every morning by taxi, east of Barcelona, but at the same time wanted to stay in the city centre. The staff was very kind and helpful. Correct rooms.

title: Excellent
review: I do not have one critisicm for this hotel.  The staff was wonderful. The front desk, house keeping, and kitchen staff were great. Room was big ang had great closet space so we could actually unpack for once in our long trip around Spain. Worth every penny. Stand up separate shower was first one we had and I missed them so much!  Breakfast was great. Nespresso machine was a real treat.

title: Good hotel with central location
review: Dear Nat, we're so happy to see your stay with us has been successful! It's an honor to us to see how people share their experiences, and intensify our efforts to offer a better service day-by-day.  Hope you have a pleasant christmas holiday! See you soon :)

title: Nice stay
review: The hotel is good, the staff is nice and the location is quite central. The decoration is modern. It is a good value hotel. The bar is quite expensive though and there aren't many bars around to have breakfast.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear guest! Thank you so much for being here with us, choosing Ayre Hotels for your stay in this lovely city! We're so pleased our teams and services were as you expected! Thank you for this review! Regarding prices, our menu has been designed with the maximum details and considering the sorrounding places (in the same apple, we have almost 5 bars), but your opinion will be treated with all the care, because it help us to improve and offer an excellent service. Hope to see you again so soon in the city! Cheers! Yours, E. Garcia, SSNN manager, Ayre Caspe

title: Great Hotel but pricey
review: This is an excellent hotel with nice clean rooms (still looks new ) - Staff is extremely friendly and helpfull. - Breakfast is extremely good value with a very well stocked cold buffet and hot items (eggs ,bacon, veggies, sausages) to order a la carte. Orange juice is natural and a glass of cava is available.   - The hotel is located at a short distance .of the metrostation Tetuan and 1 stop to the main shopping area  but you can walk easilly   (about 1,5km - 20 minutes)  - found some good restaurants close by  (Gorria , Bembi) Specially Gorria where I had  a superb seabream in the oven with lots of garlic. They have a nice selection of malt whiskys (Springbank, Glenlivet , Jura, ... )  Only negative (minor)  point is the bar that looks too much like a school refectory and as…

title: Superb
review: My young son and I stayed for 4 nights and thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the hotel. Reception and bar/restaurant staff were, without exception, extremely friendly yet highly professional and made us very welcome. (Thank you all).  We found the hotel location excellent in terms of a base for our tourist activities both on foot and for use of the metro.  Room was comfortable and immaculately cleaned each day. We would highly recommend.

title: excellent reception service
review: Dear! Thank you so much for such lovely words you dedicate us!!! Hope to see you again so soon here in Barcelona!!! Happy Week!!!

title: Great hotel for a resonable price.
review: During our stay here we met a number of staff on reception - they were all excellent with outstanding social skills and plenty of time for guests whatever their requests.  Whoever is training them is doing a great job.  This can not be said about the staff in the bar who had to be almost coerced into serving us a drink.
